column2: As the Product Manager at Alt Mobility you would be experienced in building next generation cloud data products and business intelligence solutions for our business stakeholders. You are required to manage product vision and own the product Roadmap pertaining to business and organisational needs and should be able to own and be accountable for the Product deliverables aligning to the organisation vision.                Primary responsibilities:                 Primary Technical leadership; liaison between Engineering, Sales, Manufacturing, Customer Service, Quality , Finance and Distribution centres     Define product requirements and prioritise features to deliver maximum value to customers     Should own product roadmap with excellent requirement analysis and prioritisation skills     Rapidly prototype and iterate on new product ideas     Manage product monetization strategies and drive revenue growth     Define solution approach by closely working with HoE     Come up with wireframes to explain the solution approach to business and development teams     Translate business requirements into development user stories for developers to start building the product     Manage CapEx/ OpEx estimations, resource allocations and project timeline     Ability to own multiple but related products in parallel     Drive the development process from concept to launch and beyond     Ensure the scalability and high availability of our systems     Monitor the performance and stability of our products, and proactively identify and address issues     Oversee integrations with third-party APIs     Ensure a seamless user experience for our customers     In this position, the successful candidate will manage and take the lead on key new product development/launch programs for automotive OEM applications, mainly moving to EV in the near future.     You should be able to communicate product requirements clearly and understand technical constraints.                 Required:                 At least 3+ years of experience in the Product Owner or Product Manager role in a 0-1 stage product start-up     Hands-on experience with Scrum and product management tools                 Qualifications:           Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Communication Technology or a comparable qualification     Experience in vehicle telematics and data analytics     Prior experience in working on developing analytical dashboards, interpreting trends, user behaviour, and data driven decision making     a good understanding of technology and the ability to collaborate effectively with developers and engineers is essential     Excellent communication skills are a must. Youll need to interact with various stakeholders including customers, developers, designers, marketers, and executives. You should be able to convey your ideas clearly, write effective documentation, and lead meetings.     Product Managers often need to identify challenges and come up with innovative solutions. Your ability to analyse complex problems, break them down into manageable parts, and find effective solutions will be key.     Product Managers need to understand user needs deeply and be able to translate those needs into product features and improvements.     EV fleet management analytics platforms involve complex projects with multiple moving parts. Strong project management skills are necessary to ensure that deadlines are met and the product development process stays on track.                 Why should you join us?                 Experienced founding team - This is their second start-up     The founding team knows the business & its secrets inside out as we are among the top four EV platforms.      We are already making revenues and profitable! Ask us how?      Exposure to all aspects of company building - exposure to investors, top notch EV technology, connections (as we are situated in IIT Delhi campus), decision making, building the team & ownership     All of the above perks, along with insurance plan, a cool office, competitive market salary and a great culture to work with a high potential 0-1 startup-company very early stage

column2: As a Product Manager at Global Garner, you will play a pivotal role in bringing together our wide range of products and services, explaining what makes them unique, and creating compelling promotional content. Your primary objective will be to increase the visibility of our products in the market by developing innovative strategies that capture the interest of potential customers. This includes, but is not limited to, integrating financial options, enhancing product bundles, and exploring unique value propositions.       Key Responsibilities:           Product Portfolio Management:    Manage and optimize the entire product portfolio, ensuring each product aligns with the companys strategic goals and vision.       Market Analysis:    Conduct thorough market research and analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and opportunities for product enhancement.       Product Promotion:    Develop and execute creative marketing strategies to promote our products and services, making them stand out in the market.       Value Proposition:    Create irresistible value propositions that attract potential customers and differentiate our offerings from competitors.       Integration of Financial Options:    Explore and implement innovative financial strategies such as integrating loan options with product purchases and bundling loan and insurance offers.       Vendor Relations:    Collaborate with vendors and retailers to implement buy now, pay later schemes and other attractive offers that drive sales and customer loyalty.       Cross-functional Collaboration:    Work closely with cross-functional teams including marketing, sales, design, and engineering to ensure successful product launches and ongoing product improvement.       KPIs and Analytics:    Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of product marketing campaigns and initiatives. Analyze data to make data-driven decisions.       Customer Feedback:    Collect and analyze customer feedback to make continuous improvements to the product offering.         Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in business, marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred)     Proven experience in product management, product marketing, or related roles     Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills.     Exceptional communication and presentation abilities.     Innovative mindset and a passion for creating unique product promotions.     Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.     Strong project management skills with a keen eye for detail     Experience with financial product integration is a plus.     ?

column2: As a Product Manager, you will be the driving force behind the success of our products. You will be responsible for defining the product vision, strategy, and roadmap, and working closely with cross-functional teams to bring those products to life. Your role is critical in ensuring that our products meet the needs of our customers and achieve business objectives.       Key Responsibilities           Product Strategy:    Develop and communicate a clear product strategy that aligns with the company s goals and market opportunities.       Product Roadmap:    Create and maintain a product roadmap that outlines the product s evolution and key milestones.       Market Research:    Conduct market research to identify customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape.       Requirements Gathering:    Work closely with stakeholders, including customers, sales, and engineering teams, to gather and prioritize product requirements.       Feature Definition:    Define product features, functionalities, and user experiences, working closely with design and development teams.       Project Management:    Oversee the product development process, including project timelines, resource allocation, and risk management.       Testing and Quality Assurance:    Ensure product quality through testing and QA processes, addressing issues and improvements.       Launch and Promotion:    Plan and execute product launches, including marketing strategies and sales enablement.       Performance Analysis:    Continuously monitor and analyze product performance, customer feedback, and key metrics.       Iterative Improvement:    Use data-driven insights to make product enhancements and iterate on the product roadmap.       Qualifications       bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or a related field (masters degree preferred).     Proven experience in product management, with a track record of successfully launching and managing products.     Strong understanding of product development processes, methodologies, and tools.     Excellent communication and leadership skills.     Analytical mindset with the ability to make data-driven decisions.     Strong project management and organizational abilities.     Innovative thinking and problem-solving skills

Effective Communication: Exhibits clear and concise communication skills, both written and verbal, fostering collaboration with diverse stakeholders, clients, and technical teams.         Problem-Solving Orientation: Displays a proactive approach to problem-solving, addressing technical issues and development requests with creative and efficient solutions.         Client Focus: Maintains a customer-centric mindset, understanding client problems and needs while delivering solutions within the scope of the product.         Client Relationship Management: Manages client relationships effectively, ensuring a positive customer experience and addressing technical queries and requirements.         Continuous Learning: Demonstrates a passion for research, ideation, and staying abreast of emerging technologies, contributing to ongoing improvements and innovations.         Innovative Thinking: Embraces a mindset of innovation, contributing to product ideas and improvements based on market needs and feedback.         Team Collaboration: Works effectively both independently and as part of a team, understanding the value of collaboration in achieving shared objectives. column2: 7+ Years experience in B2C Product management.          Please note:    We are looking for applicants who are willing to work from Trivandrum after 6 months.       We are looking for applicants who can join us immediately/serving notice period.              Essential Functions of the Job:           We are looking to hire a smart product manager who is passionate about taking up ideas and bringing them to life     You will engage with our customer base directly and decide the future of the product by working closely with key partners     You will also collaborate with marketing, sales and support to ensure smooth product rollout and user engagement             In this role, you'll make an impact in the following ways:           Responsible for supporting all aspects of consumer payments for b2c business models     This role will be responsible for managing the vendor(s) and continuing to refine and enhance our strategy and product development and for coordinating closely with Sales to accelerate growth     This role will encompass all aspects of product management, including articulating user stories, requirements, collaborating across internal and partner teams to explore ways to improve and expand our offering, helping to influence product strategy and drive customer adoption, and assist in the development of marketing collateral to support the sales and product rollout processes     This role will interface with many constituents throughout Treasury Services and across other LOBs including technology, client service, onboarding, Sales and operations to ensure a complete end-to-end solution is provided with an outstanding client experience                 Principal responsibilities:         As a product manager, you will take end to end ownership of a product line, identify market requirements, define the product vision, creating preliminary design concepts and drive the implementation of the product roadmap.     The perfect candidate has to be a strategic thinker who is extremely analytical and detail oriented and great at multitasking and prioritizing.     Analyze the effectiveness of the current features and define ways to improve them in order to reduce failure rates, increase usage and improve booking conversion rates based on analytics data and good understanding of customer needs.     Work closely with the design & development teams to explain the requirements of new features and change requests for current features.     Closely manage the rollout of all product requirements with a focus on both quality and time to market.     In charge of competitor analysis, market analysis, product analysis, business cases, product evolution, feature prioritization, high-level requirement gathering, and product marketing.             Desired Skills and Experience:         Works well under pressure has the ability to work within stringent timelines and to collaborate across departments to achieve results.     Must be a true problem solver with outstanding skills in discovery techniques and the proven ability to translate the underlying business needs of requests into actionable items.     A strong focus on detail, with the proven ability to ensure data and related reports are thorough and totally reliable.     A demonstrated enthusiasm for learning and working with new tools and technologies is essential.     Experience with business users and able to translate business requirements into software requirements.     7-10 years of Product Management experience working in B2C consumer internet industry will be an added advantage, including Product Management, payments, digital wallets, virtual cards, etc.     B.E./B.Tech a must. MBA from premier institutes preferred.             Knowledge and Skills Requirements:         Possesses strong understanding of the firm s business, organizational structure and operations and leverages it to effectively identify opportunities to support the firm s strategy and key initiatives.     Experience with scrum and other agile development methods.     Combination of deep technical knowledge and customer-focused mindset.     Demonstrated strategic leadership capabilities, managing globally dispersed, virtual teams and global programs.     Ability to direct a team and create an environment which supports generating and sharing creative ideas and solutions.     Understanding of and desire to strive for technical excellence.     Ability to demonstrate strong written and oral communication skills to talk about programs in a clear, compelling manner with a professional/executive presence.     Ability to assert ideas and influence others to gain support and commitment.     Self-starter, who can think strategically and consider a broad range of factors when solving/prioritizing issues and making decisions.     Strong project management, time management and organizational skills. Ability to coordinate multiple projects and initiatives at one time.     Ability to identify, influence and leverage internal subject matter resources.     Experience in successfully supporting large complex projects.     Strong relationship and project management skills.     Strong verbal and written communication skills, including ability to display a range of communication approaches for diverse community needs.     Able to demonstrate team management experience, depending on supervisory responsibilities.

column2: As the Product Manager of Conveying Solution - Special Products APAC, you will be responsible for driving product strategy and planning, Internal and External stakeholder management, ensuring the successful development and launch of our products, and developing our special solutions product roadmap.     This position requires a combination of strong strategic thinking and excellent communication skills, and the ability to inspire and motivate relevant stakeholders.     As a PM you will need to know, understand and communicate the Value Proposition and the benefit to purchase case for the products in your portfolio.      Special products would primarily included but not limited to pipe belts, engineered products (Flexowell, Sicon, Filter, Cleated belting), agricultural & construction equipment products, amongst others.         Product Strategy and Planning         Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including R&D, BD, Innovation Management, MarCom, S/C, Operations and the Segments to develop and execute product strategies aligned with company goals and market trends      Conduct market research and competitor, and product analysis to identify new product opportunities and make informed decisions     Define and prioritize product features, enhancements, and releases based on customer needs and business objectives.     Develop and manage product roadmaps, and the product life cycle, ensuring alignment with overall company strategy and objectives     Align with Global counterparts to ensure maximum synergies throughout the organization          Product Development and Launch         Oversee the end-to-end product development process in conjunction with IM and MarCom from ideation and requirements to development, testing, SOP, and market launch     Work closely with the Segments, IM, MarCom and the R&D teams to ensure timely and successful delivery of high-quality products     Collaborate with BD, MarCom and the Segment teams to develop go-to-market strategies, product positioning, and messaging     Monitor product performance, gather customer feedback, and analyze data to identify areas for improvement and optimize product offerings         Stakeholder Management         Strive for win-win outcomes that benefit both the product and its stakeholders. Look for opportunities to create shared value and align interests     Build a compelling business case for your product initiatives, highlighting the value they bring to the organization, customers, and stakeholders themselves. Use data, market research, and user insights to support your arguments     Communication and Transparency: Keep stakeholders informed about your product roadmap, milestones, and progress. Provide regular updates through meetings, presentations, emails, or a shared project management tool. Be transparent about challenges and risks and communicate how you plan to address them         KPIs         Implement KPIs that drive the business towards reaching its goal     Support dashboards preparation that provide meaningful insights to day-to-day commercial performance of product (line)     Conduct periodic business reviews to communicate measurement to KPIs         Degree in Finance, Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering     5+ years work experience preferably in at least 2 different functional areas or in different companies- with exposure in conveyor belting domain

column2: Develop new and innovative products and manufacturing processes to meet customer needs     Modify existing products and processes to improve overall quality or costs     Develop or identify new or more cost-effective ingredients and production methods                 What youll do:         Responsible for project management and good stakeholder management, product development principles, basic food regulatory understanding, RD processes, protocols     Has good verbal/ written communication skills dealing with people from product development backgrounds     Develops creates prototypes, carry out sensory, analytical evaluation and benchmarking of market products     Guides product development in product approval at customers end     Leads and works directly with production and QA team to ensure trial runs and start-up operations are properly performed for all new product development and improvement projects     Development of efficient process from RD lab scale trials to plant scale by understanding the process in detail and upscaling on production floor     Work closely with cross functional team and help to fulfill the needs of RD projects     Should be ok for travel for product trials and product evaluation     Able to work at flexible working hours when needed     Supervises product development technicians to maintain accurate inventory of RD supplies, ingredients and finished good samples     Maintain a tracking sheet for all these inventories     Develops standards and audits the product development assets for 5S readiness     Ability to develop analytical methods on new and existing ingredients and products         Leads shelf-life reports on ingredients and products.         Operates, performs needed preventative maintenance, and maintains various pilot plant equipment utilized to manufacture pilot bench top samples     Completes clean-in-place (CIP) and related sanitation tasks for the pilot plant unit lab     Responsible for ensuring work area is clean and organized       Develops systems procedures to ensure Safety and standardized work     Committed in ensuring food safety in product and process     Responsible for establishing HACCP plan for new products                  What you need to succeed:         Bachelors degree in food/dairy science or a related field.     4-5 years experience in research and/or product development.     Cultured dairy products manufacturing experience preferred.     Strong analytical and dairy component understanding.     Sound knowledge on Natural Processed Cheese manufacturing technology, awareness of formulation design, process improvement modification.     Well versed with the Food safety principles, HACCP and quality systems     Desire to grow and take on new challenges and opportunities.     Ability to travel up to 20%

column2: Qualcomm is looking for a Staff Product Manager - Software for its Connected Smart Systems Business Unit to help define and promote Qualcomm chipsets for emerging use cases in various IoT segments       Successful candidate will define software product requirements, analyze business opportunities, perform gap analysis, drive execution, and help with go-to-market plans and global customer engagements     In addition, the candidate is expected to prioritize use cases while working closely with customers, engineering, sales, and business development teams     Furthermore, the candidate will also function as a central resource with design, process, manufacturing, quality, test, marketing, and distribution as the product(s) and/or product line(s) move through their lifecycle     Lastly, the successful candidate will formulate and execute long-term roadmaps for cost/profit control and promote use of new technologies and industry-leading trends           The position requires strong expertise in business and systems analysis, strong interpersonal and communication skills, and the ability to collaborate and influence key stakeholders within Product Management team and across various functional teams                       The    key responsibilities    of this role include:                    Writing software product and functional requirements considering inputs from various internal and external stakeholders.                 Define scalable architecture for IoT applications built on Android, Yocto Embedded Linux, Ubuntu and/or Windows. Expertise in RT kernels and RTOS is a definite plus.                 Define the Linux software upstreaming strategy across various IPs, and partner with upstream community to ensure compliance of software frameworks used within the BSP.                 Define the software roadmap of features across various IoT business segments and publish plan for commercialization. Oversee successful cross-functional collaboration by ensuring the completion of milestones and ensuring the completed work aligns with roadmap for a product line(s)                 Drive an extensive ecosystem of third-party software developers while identifying opportunities for software reuse, and architecture innovation that result in software roadmap optimizations that drive an efficient engineering execution strategy and a clear go to market strategy.                 Make decisions that are significant in impact; errors are not readily apparent due to the complexity of work process/product or time between decisions and results; errors typically result in significant expenditure of time, resources, and funds to correct.                 Deep understanding of embedded software engineering principles                 Deep understanding of software stacks, and distributions based on Linux                 Reviews and identifies gaps in market based on complex analyses of overall ecosystem demands and provides recommendations to address such gaps that impact product roadmaps.                 Reviews, prepares, and delivers technical presentations regarding product roadmaps, customer RFPs, and/or proposals to demonstrate and market product portfolios to customers and/or prospective customers, and integrates customer feedback into project roadmaps.                 Drives portfolios launch strategies and identifies technical marketing opportunities such as conferences, congresses, and direct customer contact and ensures successful product launch.                 Validates business cases and determines relevance to organizational strategy; contributes to the creation of the product roadmap to advance organizational strategy and goals.                 Using verbal and written communication skills to convey complex and/or detailed information to multiple individuals/audiences with differing knowledge levels. May require strong negotiation and influence, communication to large groups or high-level constituents.                 Having a moderate amount of influence over key organizational decisions (e.g., is consulted by senior leadership to provide input on key decisions).                 Completing tasks that require multiple steps that can be performed in various orders; tasks require simultaneously executing multiple cognitive abilities and maintaining information in short- or long-term memory.                 Exercising exceptional creativity to innovate new ideas and develop innovative products/processes without established objectives or known parameters.                 Occasionally participates in strategic planning within own area affecting immediate operations.                             Minimum Qualifications:       Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, Humanities, or related field.   5+ years of Product Management or related work experience. Deep knowledge of internals of various operating systems like Android, Yocto Linux, Ubuntu, Windows IoT                 Effective communication skills with cross functional teams, both technical and non-technical, within a fast-paced, collaborative, innovative environment, including experience in discussing complex ideas with partners, customers, and executives

column1: Product Manager Operations - Digital CoE - DPEx
column2: Job Title:               Product Manager Operations - Digital CoE                                Function:               DPEx                               Location:               Hyderabad                               Key role requirements:               MBA, 5-9 years of relevant industry experience                                                About Digital Process Excellence (DPEx)                                       Our digital transformation journey is led by the DPEx team and is structured along the lines of Digitalize the Core and Transform with Digital.                             With a mandate to ensure continuous process improvement and drive patient centric innovation, it spans all functions and operations. In other words, you could be working on projects to expedite research outcomes one day, designing customer engagement platforms the next and simplifying warehouse processes the third.                                Some its priorities are:                                 Reimagine Dr. Reddy s as a platform-based organization.                             Create Data as an asset that brings competitive advantage and business impact                             Create Digital solutions that make the lives of our patients and customers easier and better                                         Who will you work with                                     You will be part of the Digital Center of Excellence team and work alongside or lead business consultants, product/program managers and technology architects. Besides that you will be interacting with the following people                         Internal:        All    functions    and teams within the organization across India and overseas locations, across org roles.                          External:            Vendors, implementation partners, knowledge networks                                                  Duties and Responsibilities                                               Key Responsibilities:                                  Identifying opportunities for value creation through digital transformation within the organization through understanding of stakeholder business goals, current processes and constraints, customer journeys and business roadmap.                         End to End ownership and management of Digital Solutions right from conceptualization phase till roll out.                         Bridge the gap between business goals and consumer problems; define and own the short term and long-term product roadmaps in line with the goals set by the business team.                         Document all the business and product requirements based on inputs from all key stakeholders; define the product acceptance testing criteria; work closely with engineering, design, data sciences, and QA teams throughout the product development lifecycle to ensure timely delivery.                         Think like an end-user and translate complicated product ideas into simple wireframes and flows to deliver the world-class user experience.                         Understand of business requirements and As-Is process mapping for arriving upon a To-Be process.                         Engage with customers partner with internal stakeholders (RD, Operations, Business, Communication, Portfolio, SCM etc) to prioritize, drive, and implement the product changes.                         Conduct A/B testing, multivariate experiments to constantly validate hypotheses and decide the best strategy to enhance the product.                         Identify key success metrics for the product, its features, and measure the metrics post-launch; constantly look for opportunities to optimize the product/feature performance.                         Leading Requirement Finalization and Solution Strategy using Design Thinking process.                         Solution conceptualization for business/process transformation using one or more digital technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), Internet of Things (IoT) Bock Chain, Mobility, Cloud etc                         Working with business teams to conceptualize platform-oriented solutions that foster better collaboration, productivity, and actionable insights for the organization.                         Effectively manage projects within schedule budget in coordination with implementation partners.                             Contribute to build Digital Quotient across the organizations through Trainings Workshops on new emerging digital technologies and their potential use cases in the domain of Global Clinical Management.                                 Adherence to Digital Product/ Solution Development best practices and processes such as Design Thinking Agile Scrum for ensuring optimum program outcomes.                                     Required Technical and Professional Expertise                                      Hands on experience of new age technologies like Digital Twins, Chatbots, RPA, AI/ML, Cloud, AR/VR, Mobile apps, Low code etc                                 Agile based project management                                 Design thinking, UI/UX expertise is required.                                 Process re-engineering experience and being accustomed to principles of Lean management is preferred.                                 Hands on experience of managing Digital and Analytics projects                                 Well versed with key terminologies of pharmaceutical industry will be preferred.                                 Good understanding of emerging technologies and their role in healthcare.                                 Ability to lead change management initiatives.                                 Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-based environment with minimal supervision.                                 Ability to articulate complexity and ambiguity in a clear, concise and compelling manner.                                 Excellent communication, articulation and presentation skills is a must.                                 Ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.                                 Ability to lead and manage a Team of Business Analysts, Partners and Technology Specialists.                                                     Qualifications We Prefer                                             Minimum    5-6 years of experience    in leading Digital Transformation Initiatives with excellent understanding of emerging digital technologies.                                 Proven success in driving Digital Analytics / Platforms / Digital Product development and management in Healthcare, Pharma and Medical Devices etc..                                 Candidates with good educational pedigree from organizations of repute.                                               Choice of                      Benefits Offered                                       The benefits you will enjoy at Dr. Reddy s are on par with the best industry standards. They include, among other things, your own laptop and other essential equipment, the flexibility to work from home, learning and development opportunities, insurance coverage for yourself (up toRs.3L) and your family and flexi-working hours

column1: Senior Manager - Network Product Development & Management
column2: The      Sr. Manager, Product Development & Management      is     an exciting new global product development role that will drive the enablement of the next generation of payment processing, by understanding local market regulatory and processing requirements, and building a roadmap for this local network payment capability that interfaces effectively back to American Express Global Network. With global responsibility, focusing at the local market level, this role will build effective partnerships with both internal and external teams to deliver new network capability which future-proofs Amex payment processing for local market requirements.                       ?             What is your role on our Team:                                  Product Development: Operating at a global level, while focusing market by market, develop, enable and operationalize local network payment capabilities and cross-border interoperability with the Amex Global Network                            As part of this product development,                        o           identify business needs and requirements for Local Network capabilities, either specific to a particular market or more broadly as part of the core Local Network infrastructure set, and build the appropriate business case to justify the capability                       o           capture requirements and context, drive envisioning and solutioning, leading to a clear feature driven technical roadmap for development                       o           oversee the development, ensuring the ultimate timely delivery of fit for purpose capabilities                       o           ensure the necessary operational support, monitoring and on-going maintenance and hygiene of new capabilities has been considered and implemented.                                 Provide on-going monitoring, support and consultancy for launched Local Network capabilities where required, acting as subject matter expert, to ensure launched capabilities remain effective and functional.                                  Support and enable the delivery of the local network product roadmap                                  Collaborate with other business units and external partners to drive and deliver local network capabilities                                 Build core payments network operational knowledge, and apply subject matter expertise to set direction and drive progress across local network projects.                                  Provide Network to Network (N2N) thought leadership, consultancy and design services, supporting the establishment of core N2N architecture, including transaction flow, N2N reconciliation, and necessary data/file transfers between Networks.                                          Provide Project Management services, developing best in class project management tools and processes to use and reapply, in leading the end to end delivery of new Local Network capabilities, through the product development life cycle and into product launch.                                 Opportunity to lead contingent workers supporting the local network projects, where required                           We re interested in hearing from people who have:                              A passion to drive delivery and results in a fast moving, innovative and sophisticated environment.                                   Strong Interpersonal skills     and the ability to influence, negotiate and drive decisions across a wide range of diverse partners                                 Experience working on large scale, cross-platform projects                                 Strong project management aptitude, preferably including understanding of Agile methodology and practices.                                 Demonstrated ability to break down and interpret complicated business needs into requirements that can be delivered against to produce a product or service                                 Flexibility and readiness to work within a global team.                                 Technical acumen, comfortable working and conversing in a technical environment                                 Strong aptitude for    balancing multiple    deliverables simultaneously, using effective prioritization and multi-tasking skills                            The following experience and knowledge will be well considered:                              Experience in developing new products, establishing and leading detailed product roadmaps                            Strong acumen in network and payment technology, network specifications, core systems and processes, ideally including new payment capabilities and trends.                                 Program and Project management experience, leading complex projects across multiple teams and geographies                                 An understanding of network policy, and how that policy governs operational capabilities and process.                                 An understanding of how network partners are connected to and configured on the AEGN network.                                 Experience in Network and Local Market/Industry message specifications                 Benefits include:                    Competitive base salaries                      Bonus incentives                      Support for financial-well-being and retirement                      Comprehensive medical, dental, vision, life insurance, and disability benefits (depending on location)                      Flexible working model with hybrid, onsite or virtual arrangements depending on role and business need                      Generous paid parental leave policies (depending on your location)                      Free access to global on-site wellness centers staffed with nurses and doctors (depending on location)                      Free and confidential counseling support through our Healthy Minds program                      Career development and training opportunities

The Product Manager will be responsible for owning the development and delivery of new products by conducting market research, creating product timeframes and plans, and crafting marketing strategies for new products.             Product Development     Research, create and introduce new products and services.     Oversee the development, management promotion of products and services.     Lead /Participate in meetings and provide advice guidance on direction of products.     Interface with the IT team, vendors, business managers and partner closely with other cross-functional stakeholders. Develop metrics to assess the success of products and features and determine necessary enhancements.     Ensure the launched product details are updated on Sales force and the website. Track monitor campaigns, sales based on prospect generation targets achieved.     Develop counseling and marketing material online and offline.     Aggressively market the products through incentives     Creating a need among those who don t know about it. Experience working with designers, tech teams to design and iterate on products.     Experience with all stages of the product lifecycle.     Must be creative, strategic, analytical, and think out of the box to solve problems.     Strong project management and time management skills.     Good Interpersonal skills with keen ability to explain complex concepts to audiences. column2: As a Product Owner, you will be an integral part of one or more project teams and will be involved in the whole lifecycle of the project, from discovery phase through to run and maintenance. The Product Owner will be responsible for working with external and internal project stakeholders including the Client, Account Manager, Project Manager, and Service Manager to ensure that the Delivery team is operating as efficiently as possible, and the Client s expectations are met.                   Responsibilities         Work with Scrum teams as the Product Owner     Work closely with the Product Manager to create and maintain backlog according to the needs of clients and Deltatre s Delivery and Commercial teams     Assess value, develop cases, and prioritize stories, epics and themes to ensure work focuses on driving business value for Clients     Provide backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of the user stories     Ensure that the team always has an adequate amount of prior prepared tasks to work on     Provide an active role in mitigating impediments impacting successful team completion of Release/Sprint Goals     Keep abreast with Agile/Scrum best practices and new trends     Manage Risks and Issues (identification / prioritization / mitigation and escalation) in line with the requirements of the Project     Run various ad-hoc research and business analyses to assess opportunities and risks. Define and analyze metrics to measure success of your actions     Lead and motivate a team of engineers and other cross-functional representatives and maintain team health. column2: The Product Manager represents experienced, senior level project management professionals with experience coordinating and delivering complex technical products and solutions in their specific functional area.    The Product Manager closely collaborates with their Product Owner peers to own the delivery lifecycle of initiatives in their functional area   . They are the delivery arm of GroundTruth s Product Organization, closely engaged with their Engineering peers and actively participating with oversight on scheduling, management of dependencies, and orchestration of cross-functional engineering teams to successfully launch new products and solutions. They are strong communicators, comfortable in technical conversations, and take ownership of decisions informed by constraints in time, scope, budget, and staffing resources. GroundTruth s Product Managers are highly organized professionals who are adept at balancing deadlines without sacrificing quality.       You will:         Work in close partnership with your Product Owner and Engineering Lead peers to deliver complex technical products and solutions;     Own and orchestrate work breakdown, sequencing, task assignment, and scheduling of multiple work streams required for delivery of those initiatives;     Organize and maintain a calendar with dependencies to keep engineering teams unblocked and on schedule;     Coordinate cross-functionally to manage dependencies with other Product Managers and Engineering teams;       Own detail-level design deliverables    (in close partnership with our design team) to provide functional specs for development;     Take ownership of value engineering initiatives to deliver cost-conscious solutions;      Iterate on existing solutions to provide continued maintenance/monitoring of key products;       Manage customer beta periods and lead    rollouts for successful delivery.         You have:       A Bachelors or Masters degree with 6+ years experience in leading product teams in the AdTech or Digital Marketing industry. Advanced degree, PMP certification, or relevant experience in Project Management, Agile/Scrum, and/or Team Leadership are a plus.       6+ years experience working in the    digital advertising industry.       Demonstrated positive business impact by delivering projects on time and on budget;     Successfully worked across multiple engineering teams to deliver cross-functional products and solutions;     Actively collaborated with business stakeholders to scope large-scale product deliveries.         You are:         An organized and detail-oriented team player;     Technically adept, comfortable working with engineering teams to design, scope, and deliver sophisticated products and solutions;     A strong communicator who can collaborate with multiple business and engineering stakeholders and find compromises and solutions;     A detail-oriented person, working with multiple teams to propose and build solutions that add value to the business;     A problem solver with a maker mindset.

column2: Skill required:Product Management - Celonis Process Mining Platform  Designation:PS&OD Specialist  Job Location:Gurugram  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:7 - 11 Years  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Business Operations vertical and help us supervise the day to day operational and administrative activities, ensuring that all processes are followed / executed and that deadlines are met  You will be working as a part of the team which is responsible for Program and Project Management. This team is highly focused on delivering successful projects to clients on time while ensuring that they are well within the scope and the budget. The team is responsible for initiating, planning and executing projects while also tracking, managing dependencies, predicting and mitigating risks. This team is also responsible for establishing and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders and third party vendors.  In this role, you will be responsible for the administration of business practices to create efficiency within an organization. It is concerned with converting materials and labor into goods and services to maximize the profit of an organization What are we looking for? Adaptable and flexible  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Written and verbal communication  Collaboration and interpersonal skills  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders Roles and Responsibilities In this role, you need to analyze and solve moderately complex problems You are required to create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures You are required to understand the strategic direction set by senior management, clearly communicate team goals, deliverables, and keep the team updated on change Your primary upward interactions are with your direct supervisor You may interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture You will be provided with guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments The decisions that are made by you will often impact your team You would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team.

column2: Summary The Client Success Manager is dedicated to introducing, promoting, and supporting our client base through the adoption of new products and digital advancements. Serving as a "user expert," they guide customers in effectively utilizing SaaS and digital technologies to achieve their goals. Additionally, the CSM understands and addresses long-term customer needs, acting as a mentor. They ensure maximum value from Epiq products by organizing tech-touch activities, webinars, and user engagements. Serving as a liaison between Product Management, Client Services, and clients, the CSM facilitates seamless communication on product-related matters. Successful candidates will possess eDiscovery business knowledge, client-facing experience, and a proven track record of managing product initiatives in a fast-paced environment. Responsibilities: Client Engagement: Develop a comprehensive understanding of clients' needs and objectives to create tailored adoption plans for new technologies and upgrades. Proactively accelerate user adoption of key SaaS products, identifying and addressing any challenges hindering adoption. Establish a feedback loop to gather real-time client input, facilitating continuous improvement of product functionality and utility. Drive adoption, usage, and retention through strategic communication plans tailored to each client. Provide hands-on assistance to clients in setting up and navigating software programs associated with our products and services. Cultivate empathy towards clients, prioritizing their needs and ensuring exceptional experiences throughout their journey. Facilitate the development of customer references and case studies to showcase success stories. Internal Collaboration: Collaborate closely with Product Management and Client Services teams to serve as the primary point of contact for client-related product matters. Drive retention and value realization within key accounts by developing and executing mutual success plans aligned with clients' business objectives. Aggregate user feedback and highlight common challenges for product enhancement, ensuring alignment with strategic priorities. Validate product readiness through participation in user acceptance testing (UAT) and stay informed about product roadmaps and timelines. Success Metrics: Measure and improve user adoption and usage rates of key SaaS products and technologies. Evaluate the ROI achieved by customers utilizing our products or services. Increase Net Promoter Scores by delivering exceptional customer experiences. Execute effective client onboarding plans and support expansion of product usage. Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in eDiscovery/Legal Services/SAAS business, with expertise in client-facing roles. Proven track record in SaaS adoption and/or training within SaaS systems. Experience in product launch management, including complex project planning and execution. Strong communication skills to engage effectively with clients, project sponsors, and technical practitioners. Proficiency in project management fundamentals and data-driven decision-making. Technical aptitude with the ability to quickly grasp new technology concepts. Ability to facilitate workshops for clients, C-level executives, and senior stakeholders. Availability to support customers in US East Coast and US Central Time Zones. Epiq, a global technology-enabled services leader to the legal industry and corporations, takes on large-scale, increasingly complex tasks for corporate counsel, law firms, and business professionals with efficiency, clarity, and confidence. Clients rely on Epiq to streamline the administration of legal department and business operations, class action and mass tort, eDiscovery, regulatory, compliance, restructuring, and bankruptcy matters. Epiq subject-matter experts and technologies create efficiency through expertise and deliver confidence to high-performing clients around the world. Learn more at www.epiqglobal.com.
column11: Client Service Management, Product Management, SAAS, Product Launch

column2: The Product Owner is responsible for the definition and delivery of a part of a product from a customer and market requirement point of view - regarding content, prioritization, quality and customer excitement for a given cost and time frame.     Responsible for a part of the product through the product life cycle from the definition to the phase-out.     Provides the associated development teams with priorities and expertise regarding the product and ensures completeness and consistency of the derived requirements within the part of the product.     Responsible for definition and delivery of a part of a product from a customer and market requirement point of view, working with one or several development teams.      Internal Interactions: Product Line Manager, Product Manager, Project Manager, Quality Manager, Development Team (eg Scrum Master, System Analyst, Architect, Developers, Testers), Usability Engineer, other stakeholders (eg Business Units),Technical Writers.     External Interactions: Collaborative customers, Customers, Cardiologists, Sonographers, Hospital Administrators and IT Administrators etc             What are my tasks       Elicit and collect stakeholder requests     Define and prioritize Market Requirements along with Product Managers.     Analyze Market Requirements (eg initiate and manage concepts for complex Market Requirements)     Derive, prioritize and communicate Software Requirements     Create Software Requirement Specifications (ie problem part)      Coach/ support development teams questions and resolve conflict regarding features and requirements     Analyze and decide complaints and charms      Achieve commitments with and motivate development teams, assist development teams in attaining maximum effective sustainable pace for development     Ensure quality by evaluating results of iterations and either approve/ accept or reject results based on DONEness criteria     Support effort estimations of development teams     Analyze change request entries and prioritize with other product backlog items     Coordinate cross-feature-area development with peers to facilitate prioritized product development     Deliver input for project management     Support roll-out of the system, presentation, workshops, training for sales and engineering             What do I need to know to qualify for this job     Qualification: A Bachelors / masters degree in engineering and / or MCA or equivalent.           Work Experience: 12 to 15 years           Desired Knowledge Experience:       Healthcare market. Product knowhow and customer understanding     Sound knowledge of Clinical Workflows and Healthcare IT, especially in the area of Cardiology.     Healthcare Industry standards like DICOM, IHE and HL7     Good understanding of software systems categorized as Medical Device     Basic understanding of Legal regulations and standards applicable for medical devices, affecting safety aspects(ie FDA 21CFR820QSR, ISO 13485)     Exposure to agile methodology     Good programming skills should have worked for a majority of time in software programming roles.     Thorough experience in Requirements Engineering, Usability Engineering and feature definition activities.     Product Lifecycle Management Software development cycle experience     Integration with different 3rd party applications.             What experience do I need to have       Professional: Several years of experience in the medical device/ healthcare industry (eg as a Product Owner, System Engineer, System Analyst, Technology Lead, Lead Architect etc), expertise in clinical and radiological workflows, experience in image processing. Several years of experience in IT product or solution business. Coming from a software development background is a must.     Project / Process: Several years of experience in requirements engineering and SW development. Ideally, IT integration experience. column2: This is a Product Manager role reporting to the Director, Products at CyberArk, US       Product Managers in the team that is responsible to drive the company s zero trust identity vision and will be tasked with owning the growth of our Cloud Directory Services and Workforce Password Management portfolios                   CyberArk provides a secure, extensible, and scalable cloud directory that allows enterprises to manage identities, maintain organizational and role hierarchy, define authentication and authorization policies     It can also federate identities from on-premises and cloud-based directories or use any combination of integrated user directories to meet any specific requirements of the enterprise     Since CyberArk Cloud Directory acts as the foundational element for all CyberArk Identity products, youll work closely with the other product leaders in the team driving key areas of SSO, Adaptive MFA, Lifecycle Management, User Behavior Analytics, Endpoint Mobility Management and Zero Trust Security                   CyberArk provides an enterprise password management solution that helps companies overcome the unique user authentication and auditing challenges presented by business applications requiring individual username and password credentials     With Workforce Password Management, users can quickly manage passwords for their business applications and securely access apps with a click of a button                                We are looking for:                                     An experienced product manager with IAM product background who can translate and map directory concepts to customer requirements and has an understanding of how passwords are stored and replayed using browser extensions.                                         A colleague who can work closely with his/her peers, engineering, design, marketing, and other product teams and share in the team s success.                                         A speaker, writer, and translator fluent in the languages of customers and their requirements, engineering, marketing, and sales.                                         A manager skilled at leading projects both inside functional boundaries and across.                                         A hands-on product manager looking to go deep in technology area and be able to speak to the smallest details.                                         Responsibilities:                                         Help drive the growth of our Directory Services platform (meet company/sales targets) and Workforce Password Management service by driving/evangelizing cross functionality teams to meet these goals. Understand gaps in the organization, and drive changes to address.                                         Define, communicate, plan, align and execute the product roadmap for Directory Services and Workforce Password Management working closely with peers to keep the product roadmap current.                                         Drive product innovation and opportunities through feedback from market data and various analysts, customers, internal stakeholders and partners.                                         Work closely with architects and developers to develop, prioritize and manage the product backlog in a lean / agile environment.                                         Drive CyberArk India engineering teams to deliver product roadmap, making priority decisions based on a decision framework; make trade-off decisions based upon immediate needs to close business, product strategy, product quality, gaps identified by analysts.                                         Work closely with UX/UI teams on product interface concepts                                         Drive product marketing to deliver go-to-market material.                                         Enable sales and support on new product releases and solutions.                                         Meet customers and partners to communicate company/product strategy, address requirements.                                         Team success this is cross functional role; ensure overall business goals are met with great alignment across CyberArk cross functional teams.                                         Should be willing to work closely with the CyberArk US, Israel and India teams and attend meetings during the US, Israel, and India time zones, as necessary.                                         Requirements:                                         3+ years of experience required in Project Management                                          BS in EE/Comp Sc or equivalent (MBA preferred)                                         Demonstrated ability to execute a vision and strategy, with a proven track record of delivering market leading solutions to market and developing new products with commercial success.                                          Identity and Access Management domain experience would be a strong plus.                                         Experience in working with legacy directories like AD, LDAP and cloud directories like Azure AD, Google Directory Service would be a strong plus.                                         TME like skills to be able to own/maintain/run demos and lab environments.                                         Cloud and/or cyber security domain expertise - Has a good understanding of enterprise IT infrastructure and cloud domains, ideally with expertise in cybersecurity.                                         Prior Development Experience: a deep understanding of software lifecycle management, Agile, Developer Experience, APIs, crypto and micro-services and related security aspects.                                         Experience with SaaS Business Models, especially as it relates to transactional, usage-based business models.                                         Excellent interpersonal, facilitation and communication skills. Should be able to represent CyberArk at industry events and with strategic customers and prospects.                                         This position is in Hyderabad and may require up to 25% travel.

Collaborate with business units and applications engineering teams to support new feature deployments, field trials, and address customer requirements at large accounts.        Collaborate and work with external alliances such as Wi-Fi Alliance, Wireless Broadband Alliance, Connectivity standards alliance, to gather industry insights and synthesize input for future product roadmaps. Prioritize IoT use-case for wider industry benefit and silicon labs focus. Minimum 8-10 years industry experience in developing wireless connectivity products in IoT or related segments. Understanding of wireless Industry standards, regulations, market dynamics and competitive trends.      Strong background in networking and Wireless technologies such as Wi-Fi (802.11 a/ac/ax/be), and exposure to other complementary connectivity technologies such as Zigbee/Zwave, BT, BLE, etc      Experience using collaboration tools such as Confluence, JIRA, and Advanced Roadmaps to facilitate communication, project management, and task prioritization. Excellent written and verbal communication skills            . Experience in emerging areas of IoT Wi-Fi including standards such as Matter/Thread, 802.11az (Wi-Fi Locationing), 802.11bf (Wi-Fi Sensing) or usage of ML algorithm in Wi-Fi highly desirable.      Deep understanding of at least one of the IoT market segments such as: Wearables, Trackers, Appliances, Smart Energy/Metering, Lighting, Consumer electronics, etc      Experience in different embedded compute SoC architectures and RTOS environment. column2: The main responsibilities of a Product Owner include:      Defining and prioritizing the product backlog: This involves working with stakeholders to determine what features and functionality should be included in the product, and determining the priority in which they should be delivered      Acting as the voice of the customer: The Product Owner is responsible for representing the needs and interests of the end-users in the product development process      Making decisions: The Product Owner has the final say on what is included in each release, and makes decisions on trade-offs between scope, schedule, and budget      Collaborating with the development team: The Product Owner works closely with the development team to clarify requirements, provide feedback on work in progress, and ensure that the product is delivered on time and within budget      Continuously monitoring and adjusting the product roadmap:      The Product Owner is responsible for ensuring that the product remains aligned with the company's overall strategy, and for adapting the product roadmap as necessary in response to changing market conditions and customer needs

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Product Manager to join the Reader Revenue team at Times Internet.          In this pivotal role, you will be at the forefront of managing the entire life cycle of digital subscription, transactions, and events products.          Your focus will encompass critical aspects such as content discovery, subscriber conversion, engagement, retention, and renewals, making you the key advocate for subscribers.         Collaborating closely with senior management, editorial, engineering, UX, and analytics teams, you will play a central role in shaping the direction of our products and features to drive revenue through our digital readership.         If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, are passionate about delivering innovative solutions, and have a keen understanding of the digital subscription landscape, we invite you to join us in this exciting opportunity.             Primary Responsibilities:             Holistic Product Management:     Manage end-to-end product requirements, conduct competitive and market analyses, oversee product adoption, and seamlessly integrate with business, engineering, and support teams.             Innovative Ideation:      Develop product design flow and conceptualize solutions that seamlessly blend elegance with strong data-driven insights.             Analytics Expertise:     Utilize tools such as Google Analytics, Clevertap, SQL, MongoDB, and in-house analytics tools to derive meaningful insights and drive data-informed decision-making.             Agile Project Management:      Employ Agile/Lean methodologies for effective project management, ensuring timely and efficient product development.             Collaborative Marketing:     Collaborate with Corporate Marketing to develop impactful marketing campaigns, product promotions, and manage marketing budgets.             Risk Management:     Identify key risks and dependencies, partnering with cross-functional teams to build robust product strategies that prioritize successful product launches.             Minimum Qualification Required:             1-4 years of digital product management experience in a B2C organization. Prior experience in subscription products or the content/media industry is a significant plus.             Bachelors degree in Engineering and a Masters in Business Administration from a top-tier university.             Analytics Proficiency: Proficient in internet metrics, Google Analytics, and other relevant analytical tools.             Passionate Creativity: Demonstrates a passion for creativity and communication across multiple touchpoints within the digital subscription landscape.             Influence and Advocacy: Possesses the ability to influence, motivate, and advocate for user needs within the team and among key stakeholders.             Communication Skills: Exhibits excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to articulate thoughts and vision effectively.             Interpersonal Skills: Demonstrates strong interpersonal skills, communicating concisely and confidently at all organizational levels.             Project Prioritization: Exhibits a strong bias for execution, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects concurrently.
column11: Product management, Interpersonal skills, Google Analytics, agile project management, Project management, Analytical, Agile, Product design, Risk management, SQL

column1: Head of Export IN - Product Portfolio Value Manager (MNC in Chemicals)
column2: Clariant is a Swiss-based global specialty chemicals company, which is concentrated and developed in three business units: Care Chemicals, Catalysts and Adsorbents & Additives. Our purpose as a company is reflected in our tagline "Greater chemistry - between people and planet", which considers the principles of customer, innovation and people orientation, as well as a focus on creating solutions to foster sustainability in different industries by offering high-value and high-performance chemical specialties.  At Clariant, we believe that diversity, equity and inclusion are essential to our success. We strive to cultivate a workplace where all employees feel welcomed, respected, supported, and valued. Our diverse workforce allows us to tap into a wealth of perspectives, experiences, and capabilities that drive innovation. We are committed to ensuring equal opportunities for professional growth and advancement across all levels of the organization, based on objective criteria and regardless of gender, gender identity, race, ethnicity, religion, protected veteran status ,age, disability, sexual orientation or other aspects of diversity in accordance with the relevant governing laws. By bringing together talented individuals with diverse backgrounds and viewpoints, we gain the agility to meet the evolving needs of our global customers and communities. Join our team to help advance our mission of fostering a culture of belonging where everyone can thrive.    Job Title -   Head of Export IN - Product Portfolio Value Manager  Location -  Airoli (Navi Mumbai) Job Type -  Full time (Hybrid) Purpose of Job: The purpose of the role is to develop and enhance fine chemical products portfolio through chemistry and technology mapping at Bonthapally site. It is an individual contributor role, with a global scope, focusing on growth, innovation, and sustainability. This role carries responsibilities that cover the APAC region. What you will be doing:   Develop and enhance the fine chemical products portfolio, with a primary focus on UV filters for cosmetic applications. Conduct chemistry and technology mapping to identify opportunities for product improvement and innovation. Work closely with the healthcare business line to develop pharmaceutical excipient production at the Bonthapally site. Design pricing formulas and provide Pricing and Reimbursement Information (PRINs) recommendations. Collaborate with the finance and operations teams to optimize asset profitability and cash flow throughout the End-to-End (E2E) value chain. Utilize chemical engineering expertise to scout potential customers and identify market opportunities. Build and maintain relationships with key customers, understanding their needs and preferences to drive product development and sales. Review and negotiate contracts with external tollers for chemical synthesis outsourcing. Perform volume allocation and ensure compliance with quality and regulatory standards. What we need:   Bachelor's degree or higher in Chemical Engineering, Chemistry, or related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in product management, preferably in the fine chemicals or cosmetics industry. Strong technical knowledge of chemical engineering principles and UV filter technology. Demonstrated ability to develop and implement pricing strategies, with experience in designing pricing formulas and providing PRINs recommendations. Excellent project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and engage with customers. Benefits: Company Culture: ??? ?Be part of an amazing team, who will be there to support you.  ??? ?A forward-looking company, with a culture of innovation and a strong portfolio in sustainable technologies. ??? ?Ongoing Professional Development Opportunities? ??? ?Inclusive Work Environment ??? ?Approachable Leadership ??? ?Long term growth opportunity? ??? ?Work-Life Balance ??? ?Speak Up Culture Employee Benefits:? ??Employee Wellbeing & Assistance Program ??Hybrid Work Model: 3 days in-office, 2 days remote ??30 Days Annual Paid Leaves ??In-house Gym ??Subsidized Cafeteria Meals ??Centralized Company Transport for Designated Routes ??On-site Employee Health Center offers doctor visits 3 days a week, with a medical attendant available all 5 days in the medical room. ??Group Medical Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance and Life Insurance ??Child Day Care facility fully sponsored by Clariant If you are interested in applying for this role, please send your applications at shalaka.kini@clariant.com with below details: Current CTC Expected CTC Notice Period Current Location Reason for job change

column1: Manager/Senior Manager/ AGM -Product Life Cycle (Consumer Durable)
column2: As a Product Lifecycle Manager, your responsibilities revolve around overseeing the entire lifespan of a product, from its conceptualization to its eventual retirement. Here's a breakdown of what your job description might include: Product Development : Collaborate with cross-functional teams including product designers, engineers, marketers, and sales teams to develop new products or enhance existing ones. You'll need to ensure that products meet market demands, technological requirements, and business objectives. Market Research and Analysis : Conduct thorough market research to identify customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscapes. Analyze data to make informed decisions about product development, pricing, and positioning strategies. Product Planning and Strategy : Develop comprehensive product plans and strategies that align with the company's overall objectives. This involves setting product goals, defining feature sets, establishing timelines, and creating product roadmaps. Project Management : Coordinate and lead cross-functional teams throughout the product lifecycle. This includes setting project milestones, allocating resources, managing budgets, and ensuring that projects are completed on time and within scope. Quality Assurance and Testing : Implement quality assurance processes to ensure that products meet industry standards and customer expectations. Coordinate product testing and validation activities to identify and address any issues or defects. Launch and Go-to-Market Strategy : Develop launch plans and go-to-market strategies for new products. This involves coordinating marketing campaigns, sales enablement activities, and customer outreach efforts to maximize product adoption and revenue generation. Lifecycle Monitoring and Optimization : Continuously monitor and evaluate product performance throughout its lifecycle. Analyze key metrics such as sales, customer feedback, and market share to identify opportunities for product optimization, iteration, or retirement. Regulatory Compliance : Ensure that products comply with relevant industry regulations, standards, and certifications. Stay up-to-date on regulatory requirements and coordinate with legal and compliance teams to address any compliance issues. Stakeholder Communication : Serve as the primary point of contact for internal stakeholders, including executives, department heads, and team members. Provide regular updates on project status, key milestones, and product performance metrics. Customer Relationship Management : Work closely with customer support teams to address customer inquiries, feedback, and complaints related to product performance or functionality. Use customer insights to drive product improvements and enhancements. Overall, as a Product Lifecycle Manager, you play a critical role in guiding products from conception to market success, ensuring that they meet customer needs, achieve business objectives, and maintain regulatory compliance throughout their lifecycle. Candidate Should be from Consumer Durable background
column11: Product Life Cycle Management, Product Development, New Product Development, New Product, Product Life Cycle
