column2: The Product Owners within S&P Global Market Intelligence Investor Relations program work as part of an Agile program. In this role, you will work closely with our Data Engineering and Cloud Engineering teams to analyze and design functional enhancements to our data and infrastructure systems and support the maintenance of the existing ecosystem. Your primary responsibility is to understand the challenges of our users, internal and external, and work alongside SMEs, Engineers, Product Owners, & Product Managers to define key features for both internal and external end users. Your role is also to educate & guide your scrum team through the development cycle to deliver value to the customer.               What s in it for You:             You will be collaborating with an international team, operating in over 10 countries.          Our team culture prides itself on inclusivity and empowerment, we want everyone to feel seen and heard at work.         You will have the opportunity of exposure to senior leadership and mentors to help identify & nurture your unique skills & talent.         At S&P Global we have a global footprint of over 34K colleagues, which creates incredible opportunities for future growth within and outside of our team.                 Responsibilities:             Support your assigned scrum teams by writing user stories, managing the backlog, refinement & prioritization, and clearing blockers.         Work with product and engineering teams to elicit requirements, identify solutions & deliver well-defined functional specifications for new data and infrastructure projects and in support of the existing ecosystem.         Ensure requirements are communicated correctly to development teams.         Help the team to remove blockers, answer questions about stories and leverage your internal relationships and network to progress feature development.         Be an active contributor in agile ceremonies. Strong execution and product delivery skills working to defined deadlines.         Familiarity with Jira, AWS, and SQL are a bonus. Excellent English written and verbal communication skills and experience interacting with stakeholders, both internal and external, peers, and leaders.         Mindset that encourages collaboration, self-organization, accountability, and a drive to deliver high-quality products.         Values collaborative teamwork to define, design, develop and deliver high-impact product, project, or process initiatives.         Ability to collaborate and influence in cross-functional teams.         Curious and self-starter.

column2: We are looking for an experienced Associate Product Manager who is passionate about building products that customers love and is willing to contribute to Supply chain finance transformation in India     You will join a dynamic and fast-paced environment and work with cross-functional teams to design, build and roll-out products that deliver the company's vision and strategy         Overview of the Function         The product team ensures market scanning, strategy implementation, roadmap, and feature definition for that product.         Reporting to         This position will report directly to the Chief Product Officer to enable him in creating new products         Best things about the job         Working in a highly entrepreneurial setup with a visionary team passionate to help scale new heights of business success.         Exposure to exploring limitless possibilities and ideas no matter how impossible they may seem today.         CredAble thrives on transparency and a culture to nurture growth.         Being part of CredAble enables you to push beyond the ordinary.       Your Role at CredAble        End-to-End ownership on product management.         Work closely with the Business Heads at CredAble to solicit ideas for new products.         Maintain awareness of competitive products, potential competitive products, competitors, and competitor capabilities and help to organize this data into meaningful product roadmap         Gain a deep understanding of customer experience, identify and fill product gaps and generate new ideas that grow market share, improve customer experience and drive growth         Drive new feature development from start to finish write specs, work cross-functionally with engineering, data, design & QA team to launch features, analyze results and iterate on feature/product via learning         Enhance Value Proposition and balance out requirements with cost to maximize the value proposition to the customer           ?       What will you bring to CredAble         Experience in Finetch or Product based company is a must.         Proven track record of managing all aspects of a successful product throughout its lifecycle.         Excellent people and team management skills.         Fluent in giving presentations to top level management.         Good technical exposure with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and web technologies.         Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams in a matrix organization         Structured and ability to think on his/her feet.           ?       Education          MBA Tier 1 college and Bachelors in Computer Science         The perks of working at CredAble:           ?       Enjoy a flexible, hybrid working model       We champion the hybrid way of work. While we work from the office from Monday to Thursday on Fridays, you can work from wherever works best for you. You can even choose to work from anywhere in the world for a stretch of 15 days in a year!        Unlimited sick leave       Not in the pink of health? Take unlimited sick leave in the unfortunate case of hospitalization or any serious illness.          ?       Paid time off       Every once in a while, we want you to be able to take a break rest, recharge and unwind in the company of your loved ones. This is why we have a month long sabbatical for newly married employees and for those who complete 3 years with the organization.        Parental leave with childcare monetary benefits       We get that parenthood is a big change bigger than many anticipate. We want our people to take the time off and enjoy this new phase with their little ones. While new mothers are given 6 months of paid leave plus the option to work from home for 6 months, new fathers can take 2 months of work from home too! For new mothers returning to work, a baby care allowance of Rs. 2.5 Lakh is provided.        Unlimited food on the house       From all-day snacks, gourmet evening refreshments, team lunches & dinners to monthly food allowances, we re making sure you never go hungry! Our Open Bar, Food and Game nights every quarter are quite a hit with the team. You can even invite your friends and family over for evening refreshments once a month!        Comprehensive health insurance packages       Your physical and mental health is highly important to us. Which is why we have made employee health and workplace well-being our top priority. We ve also got you covered with group health, parental and accidental insurance.        Generous rewards       We celebrate our people with rewards, recognition and more! On achieving the company targets, you will be taken on a fun offsite. Outstanding contributors will be invited to the yearly offsite with the senior management and will also be given financial incentives for their performance. We ve even got free merchandise and peer-cash bonuses for you!        Learning never stops at CredAble       We re here to help you grow, both professionally and personally. Get 50% of your learning course fee reimbursed. Got a passion? We re here for it! We will give you a reimbursement of up to Rs. 10,000 for any course that you pick up for your personal goals.

column2: As an associate product manager, you will be part of shaping the Findify by Maropost platform. Our product is an enterprise search & merchandising solution, including advanced machine learning algorithms to personalize eCommerce experiences. As demand for our product continues to increase & weve recently become part of the Maropost group, we are on a journey to grow the team. We would love for you to join us.                    About you:             You are a high-energy self-starter with a great interest in understanding client needs in-depth and the ability to simplify complex problems.                  You will be part of the product team with the primary focus on evolving our platform. You will be leading independent initiatives throughout the entire journey from research & scoping to validation, implementation & launch. While e-commerce is a technical industry, your core focus is not technology but understanding client needs & how these can be transformed into tangible initiatives in line with our long-term vision & business objectives. You will work side by side with an experienced team to ensure a great learning curve.          We welcome candidates from Chandigarh and Bangalore to complement our existing teams                   What Youll Be Responsible For:               Quantitative & qualitative client research to explore needs, validate solutions & evaluate impact.          Work together with design & engineers to plan & execute the implementation phase.          Close collaboration with Sales, Support & Customer Success to understand changing client needs & guide the application of new solutions.          Ongoing industry research, trend spotting & competitive analysis.          Define desired outcomes of projects and initiatives.         Gather all key requirements, and deliverables and define main benefits.                        What Youll Bring to Maropost:               4+ years of experience specifically in product management.         Demonstrated ability to investigate and research combined with problem-solving. You are a self-motivated individual who enjoys taking initiative and getting things done.          3+ years of experience coordinating projects or initiatives from planning to execution while managing various internal and external stakeholders.         A team player; you are comfortable working with different styles and believe (like us) that together we achieve much more than alone          A great communicator; you are comfortable communicating in English both written and oral, including leading meetings, selling your ideas and great storytelling.         You have an analytical and curious mindset that enjoys both quantitative & qualitative research and has a passion for bridging the gap between technology and user experience                      We would be extra impressed if you also have the following:               Experience with the e-commerce industry in general or Search & Merchandising in particular.         Experience in developing SaaS products and working in remote teams.         Experience in Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets, with a passion for AI/ML.

column2: Talk to customers, understand their problems, and surface issues we weren t devoting enough attention to         Ramp up on the business, the product, and how we work         Design and run marketplace experiments to validate hypotheses         Write weekly write-ups and other documentation to keep others abreast of your work         In your first 90 days you ll:         Own an important problem on your own         Write a plan (you may have to write several drafts) that proposes a solution to the problem         Broadcast the plan to relevant stakeholders, get their feedback, and adjust it         Execute on the plan and report findings to the executive team         You can t be successful here if you:         Don t enjoy writing. We write a lot, and we hold our writing to a high standard. If you aren t comfortable being scrutinized on not only the content but the clarity of your writing week over week, our culture won t be a good fit for you.         Want to know what to do. In your role as an APM, you ll regularly be given tasks that are seemingly ambiguous. You will have to use your judgment to bring clarity to it. You may even propose that the task isn t something we should focus on today. That s okay too.         Don t like working with data or math. As a marketplace company, we have a highly quantitative culture. Our language is steeped in numbers.         Don t enjoy talking to customers. We talk to our customers day in and day out. Our customer conversations are an integral part of how we make decisions.         Don t want an intellectual challenge. The problems we face are novel and challenging, and we expect people to solve them quickly. If you aren t looking for an intellectual challenge in your role, this won t be a good fit.

column2: The Associate Product Manager - Broker Research - we seek must have a working knowledge of investment research, including its real-time and aftermarket business models, and the client use-cases for each     The primary focus of this role will be the integration of broker feeds and data into AlphaSense     As important will be the need to constantly analyze and enhance the feed integration process itself, either by process enhancements and / or by working with our agile scrum teams to enhance our workflow tools     This individual will also understand and have worked with various brokers and independent research providers and be capable of articulating a vision for research on AlphaSense to deliver a research experience that delights           Who you are:        5-7 years experience in financial services with a specific focus on broker research. Effective communication skills working with brokers and third-party content aggregators.     Strong analytical skills and outstanding attention to detail. B2B SaaS and/or enterprise software application company experience. Manage and maintain strong new and ongoing broker and independent research relationships with key decision makers, product and technology teams at individual broker and independent research firms.     Project manage partnership initiatives with research providers. column2: Job Description: Product Manager  Role & responsibilities:    Product Strategy:  Assist in developing and refining the overall product strategy, considering market trends, competitor analysis, and user feedback.  Contribute to the creation of a product roadmap that aligns with the company's business objectives.    User Research:  Conduct user interviews, surveys, and data analysis to gather insights into user behaviors and preferences. Utilize feedback to inform product enhancements and identify opportunities for innovation.    Cross-Functional role:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams including editorial, SEO, Tech, and marketing, to define and execute product strategies and prioritize features based on business impact and user needs.  Create detailed product specifications, user stories, and wireframes to guide development teams.    Development Support:  Work closely with the tech teams during the development process, providing clarification on requirements and addressing any issues that may arise.  Conduct regular sprint reviews to ensure alignment with product goals.    Testing and Quality Assurance:  Develop and execute product testing plans to ensure the delivery of high-quality features. Gather and analyze user feedback on new features, and iterate based on findings.    Analytics and Reporting:  Use analytics tools to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and user metrics. Generate regular reports on product performance, presenting insights to stakeholders.    Preferred candidate profile:   Bachelor's degree in an Engineering/ Computer Science/ management field    Previous experience 5+ years in product management, preferably in tech or digital publication.    Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a data-driven approach to decision-making.    Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.    Familiarity with agile development methodologies.    Understanding of digital news trends and technologies

column2: The Product Manager - Trip Attach at Fareportal will have full product ownership of the Trip Attach business across all of Fareportal s consumer website and apps     The Product manager will align the business vision, market and competitor trends, customer feedback and business analytics to create, prioritize, and execute a roadmap that delivers sustainable business growth and meets the Financial goals and targets for the Trip Attach business     Trip Attach involves helping our customers who have already booked one travel product with us, such as flight, discover and book other travel products with us, such as a hotel stay or a car rental     The Product manager will work with various stakeholders to combine different needs and goals to support the creation of a coherent product strategy     Ownership of the Trip Attach Product, including P&L responsibility.     Own and optimize customer journeys for the attachment of Trip Attach bookings     Go-to person to explain movement of key Trip Attach KPIs.     Hands-on participation to create and improve attachment and revenue KPIs for Trip Attach by working with development, design, marketing, data science, analytics and other teams as needed.     Work directly with the dedicated development team, run scrums, plan their sprints and participate in routine discussions to address questions on the proposed user stories.     Coordinate with Core-Air team and Marketing teams to optimize bookings from Trip Attach pathways     Partner with Core-Car and Core-Hotel teams to develop effective strategies to grow Trip Attach bookings     Lead research, metrics gathering, competitive and performance analyses of products listed above, and communicate results across the company.     Author and publish requirements, identify and outline the needs to increase attachment, convert findings to clearly defined user stories so they are easily executed by the technology team     Become a key member of the Fareportal Product team, ensuring our Trip Attach product aligns with customers needs and overall company strategy.     Complete ongoing competitive analysis to ensure that we are providing top-tier products and customer experiences for our customers. Improving data collection, utilizing big data, and providing requirements to develop custom reports.     Build products that rate highly by customers (NPS > 75) and deliver commercial growth for Fareportal.     Lead daily Product quality checks (price checks, customer experience, site speed and functionality, content quality, customer feedbacks, etc)     Collaborate with pricing team and oversee Trip Attach, pricing analysis with Fare Data Analysis team. Strong Business Intelligence, analytical, data interpretation and problem-solving skills.     Well versed in scientific method and hypothesis based AB Testing and product development. Excellent hands-on analytical skills, with a proven ability of multi-tasking with minimal oversight     Experience developing and managing ongoing business relationships at multiple organizational levels and working in a dynamic cross-functional environment. column2: As the Senior Digital Product Manager for BPme you will be responsible for ensuring the Bpme vision continues to resonate with our consumers and lead the execution of the strategy to achieve ambitious commercial goals and desired outcomes     You will ensure consumer engagement channels have a consistent customer experience, across mobile app and web where the BPme program is represented     You will ensure we continuously engage with our customers and gain valuable insights to further inform our strategy and ensure the product backlogs reflect the right priorities     You also need to be comfortable and be able to operate effectively in a highly matrixed organization, influencing and collaborating with key stakeholders to achieve the right outcomes     The role is truly global as you will work with Product Managers and Digital Marketing Managers across our key BPme markets as well as engaging stakeholders in potentially new markets for the app     You will work closely with colleagues in our Customer & Products organization and the discipline leads across the engineering, design and architecture teams that develop the product     Such is the profile of BPme, you need to be comfortable engaging and communicating at all levels of our organization and be able to provide clear concise communication on the progress and performance of the product     Recognising the ambition we hold and the vision we have for Bpme, this is a very exciting and high-profile role in our Innovation and Engineering organization, and one that will play a key part in our continued transformation     This is an opportunity to make a difference to ensure we embed solid technical knowledge into the mobile and web channels to ensure we deliver against our consumer engagement channel vision for BPme mobile and web             Key Accountabilities:          Sets the vision for the product     Overall Digital Product Strategy proposition development based on market research and goals of the business for value generation     Responsible for driving the product growth strategy, analytics strategy and performance management and reporting.     Development of strategies to increase adoption and usage of digital product in line with customer lifecycle - acquisition, retention and churn prevention strategies     Ensures continual testing of concepts, hypothesis and MVPs with consumers     Promotes a Customer centric mindset - guide our thinking and behaviour in delivering better experiences for our customers     Responsible for understanding and owning the holistic customer experience within the digital channels, solving customer pain points and ensuring all features sit well alongside each other     Collaborates with the Consumer Mission Leads and Marketing teams to define and prioritize the roadmaps to underpin the strategy     Works with Product Managers on planning and maintaining an up to date delivery roadmap with a clear focus on business value and associated KPIs and value measures     Brings together different disciplines from Engineering, Product, Design and Architectire to support alignment across the roadmaps.     Identifies integration opportunities between capabilities and ensures optimisation of applications for improved design and user experience     Manages ongoing prioritisation of product backlogs across the markets     Takes care of the overall milestone planning, execution, delivery and release of complex cross-team engineering initiatives      Provide visibility of deliverables to stakeholders and the wider team     Highlight delays and blockers to stakeholders as required to assist the delivery function.     Guides teams to reflect and identify improvements and successfully embed new approaches that move them towards high performance. Identify frequently occurring technical blockers, and work with teams to get them resolved.     Ensures common performance management tools are used in partnership with other teams and enables visibility and transparency of performance and value generation through reporting dashboards     Relationship management with a wide range of senior business stakeholders     Oversees product maintenance and support     Manages product incidents and trade-off decisions on priority (hot fix versus new functionality)             Essential Experience:              Experience of leading a global or multi-market digital product, ideally with a B2C focus     Mobile App and web channel and product experience.     Experience in mobile app and web analytics and analytic platforms with an Ecommerce and loyalty understanding.     A customer-centric mindset     Understand and appreciate the importance of discovery and user experience design process     A good working knowledge of Agile practices, ability to demonstrate agile ways of working (agile ceremonies, backlog prioritization)     Have sound understanding of modern software engineering (DevOps; CICD, automation, QA, tooling, etc)     Be delivery orientated     Experience of continuous consumer led research and insights     Communicate clearly and concisely     Bring new collaboration techniques to the table     Demonstrate a flexible mind set     Be respectful and embrace inclusion      Be a team player     Communication - Able to relate to and communicate with both business and technology people     Stakeholder management - Able to understand and respond to the drivers and concerns of a wide range of both business and technical stakeholders     Conflict resolution - Must be able to facilitate discussion and the development of alternatives or different approaches     Problem solving skills - organizational and analytical skills, and the ability to work round obstacles to get things done     Partner/Supplier management - Understanding of key processes and how to get the best from our Partners             Desirable Experience:          Experience in designing end to end consumer experiences across multiple touch points (both digital and physical)     Experience of integrating multiple consumer missions and services into a seamless consumer experience     Specific knowledge of working with Agile project management for the following areas: business risk management, relationship management, contract management, financial management, benefits management, and sourcing     Good knowledge and understanding of development methodologies (Agile using Scrum and/or Kanban)      Familiar with DevOps practices and techniques such as Value Stream Mapping, Lean, flow, eliminating waste     Good interpersonal skills including the ability to relate complex topics in simple and accessible language

column2: Have led the success of digital products, with a focus on building/integrating Identity-based platforms or managing eCommerce and Mar-tech features across Direct to Consumer products. Continuously assess market trends, competition, and customer feedback to refine and adjust the product strategy as needed.              Product Planning: Define product roadmap and prioritize features and enhancements based onbusiness value, customer impact, and technical feasibility. Work closely with stakeholders, including engineering, design, marketing, and sales teams, to ensure alignment and successful execution.              Requirement Gathering: Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze product              requirements, translating customer needs into actionable user stories, feature specifications, and acceptance criteria. Release Management: Coordinate product releases and updates, including feature rollouts, bug fixes, and performance enhancements. Stakeholder Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including executives, customers, partners, and vendors. Act as the primary point of contact for product-related inquiries and updates.              Product Evangelism: Serve as a passionate advocate for the product, both internally and externally. column2: Product Manager            Product Manager      The Role :          The Role :          The ideal candidate will be Product      Leader who can self-drive eCommerce Analytics projects and deliver revenue generating product offerings for Anchanto customers. This critical role is crucial in achieving genuinely world-class repeatable results that grow our expertise and ensure we win as Anchanto Product team. This position will report to the Senior Director of Product, Anchanto.      This role is part of the Anchanto s Product team with a specific focus on building products for e-commerce. Your mission is to drive innovation. As a Product Manager on the team, you will collaborate with multiple functions including engineering, business and operations across geographies. You will work closely with key stakeholders and drive the Integrations vision, strategy, roadmap, and execution of product strategy.        Who Are You:          Strong e-commerce and / or supply chain / logistics / shipping domain knowledge/E-Commerce software evangelist with proven experience with Marketplace products as a Product Manager          Ability to organize and prioritize work, establish realistic goals and deadlines and manage changing priorities          Ability to achieve goals in an innovative environment and to evolve product strategy based on research, data, and industry trends          Excellent communication skills, creative/strategic thinking skills along with strong analytical and problem-solving skills          Ability to analyze products and drive process improvements aligned with strategic goals          Ability to work independently and manage multiple product areas and initiatives          Build strong business partnership with key stakeholders          Ability to explain the business and technical value of a technical offering to an audience mix of technical and non-technical customer representatives          Key Responsibilities:          Engage with diverse stakeholders to understand client objectives, pain points, and expectations for platform functionalities.          Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize product ideas based on customer/market needs.          Translate requirements into actionable metrics, user stories, and data products, launching them in sprint activities.          Analyze data availability gaps, visualize data, and identify patterns to inform decision-making.          Collaborate with UI/UX teams to design prototypes and enhance user experiences, visualizing data on dashboards.          Conduct market studies, A/B testing, and data analysis to inform product development and pricing strategies.Develop product collateral aligning with the features roadmap and vision.          Ability to conceptualize and explain business solutions, translating them into technical approaches.          Ensure end-to-end understanding of system flow and architecture, addressing customer problems effectively.          Assess and recommend improvements to system architecture, collaborating with Data Integration teams.          Define business and functional requirements, create documentation, and review test cases and perform UAT.          Stay updated on product features, conduct demos for customers, and exchange information effectively between business and engineering tea          Essential Requirements:          5+ years of overall experience, with 3-5 years specifically in Product Management for eCommerce analytics and processes, preferably in e-commerce or Enterprise SaaS companies.          Strong track record in managing customer engagement platforms, with a focus on building data products to address critical business challenges with user-centric approaches.          Experience in influencing partner roadmaps and a solid grasp of marketing platform solutions in the cloud.          Demonstrated ability to lead products from concept to sales or user adoption, with excellent communication and interpersonal skills.          Proficiency in collaborating with globally distributed teams, delivering insights from ambiguous business challenges, and driving self-motivated initiatives.          Expertise in product development activities, including planning and cross-functional collaboration, in high-growth and dynamic environments.          Ability to quantify business requests, provide efficient solutions, and prepare technical overviews and task lists for project scopes.          Proficiency in data analysis, including advanced Microsoft Office Suite skills, with knowledge of applicable business systems and industry standards.          Strong analytical and organizational skills, with a passion for research, ideation, and exploring emerging technologies.          Excellent written and verbal communication skills, essential for managing client relationships, resolving technical issues, suggesting solutions, and collaborating effectively within teams.          Benefits          Global Position, 20% Travel required.          Medical Insurance (option to include parents)          Personal Accident Insurance          Annual Health Check-up          Hybrid Work Environment          Competitive salary package          Learning opportunities          Personal Attributes:          Adaptability: Demonstrates flexibility and resilience in a rapidly changing environment, embracing new challenges with a positive attitude.          Analytical Thinking: Possesses strong analytical skills to assess complex business requirements, identify solutions, and perform data analysis effectively.          Effective Communication: Exhibits clear and concise communication skills, both written and verbal, fostering collaboration with diverse stakeholders, clients, and technical teams.          Problem-Solving Orientation: Displays a proactive approach to problem-solving, addressing technical issues and development requests with creative and efficient solutions.          Client Focus: Maintains a customer-centric mindset, understanding client problems and needs while delivering solutions within the scope of the product.          Client Relationship Management: Manages client relationships effectively, ensuring a positive customer experience and addressing technical queries and requirements.          Continuous Learning: Demonstrates a passion for research, ideation, and staying abreast of emerging technologies, contributing to ongoing improvements and innovations.          Innovative Thinking: Embraces a mindset of innovation, contributing to product ideas and improvements based on market needs and feedback.          Team Collaboration: Works effectively both independently and as part of a team, understanding the value of collaboration in achieving shared objectives.          Project Management Skills: Exhibits the ability to self-manage time, prioritize tasks, and efficiently manage projects with minimal supervision.          Technical Acumen: Possesses a good understanding of technical concepts, high-level programming languages, and the software development life cycle (SDLC) to drive technical changes effectively.

column2: In the rapidly evolving world of technology, the role of a Product Owner for cloud services is pivotal. This role is at the heart of our cloud and managed services domain, driving the vision and execution of our product strategy. As a Product Owner, you will be entrusted with the conception, design, development, and enhancement of our cloud services offerings.     Your work will involve close collaboration with various stakeholders, including clients, end-users, and the product team, to understand needs, define requirements, and oversee the product life cycle. You will be instrumental in shaping the product roadmap, managing the product backlog, and ensuring that our products align with the company s vision and goals.     This role requires a unique blend of business acumen, technical knowledge, and excellent communication skills. If you are passionate about cloud technologies and thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment, this role is for you. Join us in shaping the future of cloud services and delivering value to our clients.         Roles and Responsibilities         Collaborating with prospective users and clients to understand and anticipate their needs and translate them into product requirements.         Defining the vision for the team s product.         Creating a product road map based on this vision.         Managing the product backlog and prioritizing them based on changing requirements.         Overseeing all stages of product creation including design and development.         Developing user stories.         Monitoring and evaluating product progress at each stage of the process.         Liaising with the product team and end-users to deliver updates.         Participating in Scrum meetings and product sprints.         Incorporating feature requests into the product roadmap.         Grooming and prioritizing backlog.         Developing user stories and defining acceptance criteria.         Setting sprint goals.         Writing acceptance tests.         Planning releases and upgrades.         Following the progress of work and addressing production issues during sprints.         Analyzing preferences and requests of end users.         Refining our agile methodology based on results and client feedback.         Keeping track of industry trends.           Requirements and Skills         Work experience as a Product Owner or similar role in product management.         Familiarity with agile is a plus.         Hands-on experience managing all stages of the product life cycle.         Technical background with knowledge of software development and web techniques.         Team spirit and good communication abilities.         This role requires a deep understanding of cloud services and the ability to work with cross functional teams to manage product releases. The Product Owner plays a crucial role in planning releases, coordinating sprints, and ensuring products align with the company s vision.           Educational Requirements         Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.         Master s degree in Business Administration or a related field can be advantageous.         Certifications such as Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO), SAFe Product Owner/Product Manager, or similar can be beneficial.         Knowledge of cloud services and technologies is essential.         Familiarity with agile methodologies and Scrum framework.

column1: Associate Technical Support Engineer - Product Support
column2: The Associate Technical Support Engineer assists Rocket customers with questions and problems regarding the installation, setup, configuration and functionality of Rocket Software products. The Engineer will troubleshoot reported symptoms to aid in the resolution process either directly for the customer or to help guide the development team in providing permanent solutions. The Engineer will typically work as part of a team with limited direction                Job Overview:             The Technical Support Engineer (TSE) will be part of a team of support engineers in a fast-paced support organization with the primary mission to provide world class support to Rocket s customers and partners     The successful candidate will have a good understanding of (JDBC) Java Database Connectivity or (ODBC) Open Database Connectivity, IBM s Linux/Unix/Windows (LUW) and IBM DB2 environment and concepts     He/ She will work with customers directly and take ownership of the problem record from receipt to closure     They should have excellent critical thinking skills - to understand, investigate/recreate the problem and explain the solution to the customer in a timely and concise manner     Our TSE s should be able to work independently yet know when to leverage the lab to troubleshoot complex problems     The ability to setup test environments to recreate customer situations is a definite plus     They should provide feedback from the customer to the lab about the product to better it and participate in a continuous improvement process     They should have excellent verbal and written skills to aid in writing tech docs and knowledge base articles             Responsibilities:         Scripting language experience - preferably Shell or Perl.     Knowledge of (ODBC) Open Database Connectivity or (JDBC) Java Database Connectivity.     Knowledge of Microsoft .NET framework environments.     Knowledge of cloud-based application deployments is a plus.     Troubleshooting skills at the application-level e.g: using debugger or log analysis.     Experience of Communicating with Customers.     RDBMS administration and skills.     Java or C/C++ and other language skills.     Understanding of Networking and Transmission Control Protocol/Internal Protocol (TCP/IP).     Exposure to Open Source technologies.     Any other spoken /written language skills other than English is a plus.     Assist other TSEs at various levels.     Accountable for team and individual results.     Participate in internal projects and other work as directed.     Self-directed learning to expand expertise of Rocket Software products.     Contributes to training content, as necessary.         Required Skills:         2-5 years experience as a Technical Support Engineer.     Excellent troubleshooting abilities.     Strong soft skills.     Ability to identify and complete tasks in a dynamic environment.     Ability to effectively work with customers to resolve problems.     Familiarity with electronic issue tracking systems.     Excellent written and verbal communications skills.     BS degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent experience.     Must have strong interpersonal skills with the ability to manage time sensitive customer related issue.         Desired Experience:         Knowledge of (ODBC) Open Database Connectivity or (JDBC) Java Database Connectivity.     Prior product support experience.     Troubleshooting skills at the application level.     Experience of Communicating with Customers.         Experience & Qualifications:       2+ years of technical engineering support.     Preferred technical computer knowledge.     Bachelor of Science Degree preferred.     Available for some after hours, weekend and/or holiday work.
column11: Unix, C++, Networking, Linux, Windows, Troubleshooting, microsoft, Continuous improvement, Information technology, Product support

column2: This position requires a consultant with a solid track record of IT business solution architecture with both depth and breadth preferably with the consumer products manufacturing and distribution industry.                    Key Responsibilities:                  The main responsibility for this role is ensuring that the global SAP GTS solution is successfully implemented delivering the business capabilities in an environment which is safe, secure and enabled for future growth.                      Responsible for business need solutioning, including solution design, proposals and end-to-end business process engineering and requirements mapping in the GTS area. Designs and develops IT solutions (integrated process, applications, data, and technology) solutions to business problems in alignment with the organization IT direction and standards                          Help define business requirements and process design, (including scenario design and flow mapping)                          Designs major aspects of the architecture of the GTS applications, including components such as user interface, middleware and infrastructure integration points                          Create functional designs, prototyping test planning and execution, training coordination, and documentation of operational support procedures                        Serves as liaison between business users and technology group for system implementation and maintenance.                  Effectively communicate complex concepts and solutions to all level of the organization and project team, including facilitation of decisions and consensus building.                  With focus on the commercial business, this role will be responsible for formulating and defining complex GTS systems scope and objectives through analysis, testing and fact-finding combined with a comprehensive understanding of the GTS system and industry requirements.                  The role will serve as a proactive partner to the business and IT as part of a global team to enable business transformation through technology in the S4 Hana project implementation.                  Drive business process transformation and continuous improvement with key business partners and other McCormick Technology solution teams.                  Acts as work stream leader from start to finish with accountability for successful solution delivery within area of responsibility. Foster and maintains good relationships with business partners and IT colleagues to meet expected customer service levels.                  Work across solution teams to ensure proper system/data integration.                  Champions and develops innovative IT principles and ideas.                  Partners with Scrum teams to ensure delivery aligns with project objectives. Adheres to project timelines to complete tasks on time, budget and aligned with business user expectations.                  Provide leadership over program standards and performance as it pertains to solution design concepts, deployment and steady-state for GTS.                    Key Skills/ Qualifications:                  Bachelor s degree in computer science, information systems, or another technology-related field                      Strong business transformation experience along with demonstrable stakeholder management experience, with an ability and attitude to influence and advise at all levels, up to executive leadership.                      10+ years of related SAP experience, with at least 3 years experience      in SAP GTS with S4 HANA and EDI.                          Minimum 2-3 full life-cycle implementation experience with SAP GTS preferably in the S4 HANA landscape.

column2: Are you a seasoned Product Owner with a passion for innovation and a deep understanding of Salesforce? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment, crafting strategies, and translating them into actionable Epics, Features, and Stories? Join us at Technix Technology, a leading technology solutions provider, as we seek a Product Owner to be placed at our prestigious client, AMEX. As a consultant at AMEX, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our offerings, leveraging your analytical prowess, stakeholder management finesse, and hands-on query language skills.         Responsibility        Collaborate closely with stakeholders, development teams, and architects to define, prioritize, and deliver impactful product features and enhancements.     Craft comprehensive product strategies, translating them into a well-structured roadmap that aligns with business goals and customer needs.     Utilize your 5+ years of hands-on experience in Product Management within the Salesforce ecosystem to bring valuable insights and expertise to the table.     Dive into data, employing your analytical acumen to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for optimization.     Navigate complex organizational structures with finesse, ensuring seamless communication and alignment across teams.     Expertly break down high-level Epics into actionable Capabilities, Features, and User Stories, ensuring a clear and concise product backlog.     Leverage your proficiency in SQL or similar query languages to extract and manipulate data, enhancing decision-making processes.     Demonstrate a keen understanding of GDPR/Privacy, Security, and other aspects of product development, going beyond core functionalities.     Champion the SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) construct, contributing to effective Agile ceremonies and promoting a culture of continuous improvement.     Bring your go-getter attitude and innovation mindset to drive results, lead discussions, and contribute to a collaborative work environment.       Requirements        Bachelors degree (preferably in Engineering or an MBA)     Minimum 5 years of hands-on experience in Product Management within Salesforce & Data.     Strong analytical skills with a data-driven approach to decision-making.     Proficiency in SQL or similar query languages.     Experience working with onshore-offshore teams in a SAFe construct.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Ability to create strategies, prioritize tasks, and lead cross-functional teams.     Adept at breaking down Epics into manageable User Stories and defining acceptance criteria.     Thrives in a fast-paced environment, adaptable to change, and driven by results.

column2: Job Title:               Product Manager Operations - Digital CoE                                Function:               DPEx                               Location:               Hyderabad                               Key role requirements:               MBA, 5-9 years of relevant industry experience                                                About Digital Process Excellence (DPEx)                                       Our digital transformation journey is led by the DPEx team and is structured along the lines of Digitalize the Core and Transform with Digital.                             With a mandate to ensure continuous process improvement and drive patient centric innovation, it spans all functions and operations. In other words, you could be working on projects to expedite research outcomes one day, designing customer engagement platforms the next and simplifying warehouse processes the third.                                Some its priorities are:                                 Reimagine Dr. Reddy s as a platform-based organization.                             Create Data as an asset that brings competitive advantage and business impact                             Create Digital solutions that make the lives of our patients and customers easier and better                                         Who will you work with                                     You will be part of the Digital Center of Excellence team and work alongside or lead business consultants, product/program managers and technology architects. Besides that you will be interacting with the following people                         Internal:        All    functions    and teams within the organization across India and overseas locations, across org roles.                          External:            Vendors, implementation partners, knowledge networks                                                  Duties and Responsibilities                                               Key Responsibilities:                                  Identifying opportunities for value creation through digital transformation within the organization through understanding of stakeholder business goals, current processes and constraints, customer journeys and business roadmap.                         End to End ownership and management of Digital Solutions right from conceptualization phase till roll out.                         Bridge the gap between business goals and consumer problems; define and own the short term and long-term product roadmaps in line with the goals set by the business team.                         Document all the business and product requirements based on inputs from all key stakeholders; define the product acceptance testing criteria; work closely with engineering, design, data sciences, and QA teams throughout the product development lifecycle to ensure timely delivery.                         Think like an end-user and translate complicated product ideas into simple wireframes and flows to deliver the world-class user experience.                         Understand of business requirements and As-Is process mapping for arriving upon a To-Be process.                         Engage with customers partner with internal stakeholders (RD, Operations, Business, Communication, Portfolio, SCM etc) to prioritize, drive, and implement the product changes.                         Conduct A/B testing, multivariate experiments to constantly validate hypotheses and decide the best strategy to enhance the product.                         Identify key success metrics for the product, its features, and measure the metrics post-launch; constantly look for opportunities to optimize the product/feature performance.                         Leading Requirement Finalization and Solution Strategy using Design Thinking process.                         Solution conceptualization for business/process transformation using one or more digital technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), Internet of Things (IoT) Bock Chain, Mobility, Cloud etc                         Working with business teams to conceptualize platform-oriented solutions that foster better collaboration, productivity, and actionable insights for the organization.                         Effectively manage projects within schedule budget in coordination with implementation partners.                             Contribute to build Digital Quotient across the organizations through Trainings Workshops on new emerging digital technologies and their potential use cases in the domain of Global Clinical Management.                                 Adherence to Digital Product/ Solution Development best practices and processes such as Design Thinking Agile Scrum for ensuring optimum program outcomes.                                     Required Technical and Professional Expertise                                      Hands on experience of new age technologies like Digital Twins, Chatbots, RPA, AI/ML, Cloud, AR/VR, Mobile apps, Low code etc                                 Agile based project management                                 Design thinking, UI/UX expertise is required.                                 Process re-engineering experience and being accustomed to principles of Lean management is preferred.                                 Hands on experience of managing Digital and Analytics projects                                 Well versed with key terminologies of pharmaceutical industry will be preferred.                                 Good understanding of emerging technologies and their role in healthcare.                                 Ability to lead change management initiatives.                                 Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-based environment with minimal supervision.                                 Ability to articulate complexity and ambiguity in a clear, concise and compelling manner.                                 Excellent communication, articulation and presentation skills is a must.                                 Ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.                                 Ability to lead and manage a Team of Business Analysts, Partners and Technology Specialists.                                                     Qualifications We Prefer                                             Minimum    5-6 years of experience    in leading Digital Transformation Initiatives with excellent understanding of emerging digital technologies.                                 Proven success in driving Digital Analytics / Platforms / Digital Product development and management in Healthcare, Pharma and Medical Devices etc..                                 Candidates with good educational pedigree from organizations of repute.                                               Choice of                      Benefits Offered                                       The benefits you will enjoy at Dr. Reddy s are on par with the best industry standards. They include, among other things, your own laptop and other essential equipment, the flexibility to work from home, learning and development opportunities, insurance coverage for yourself (up toRs.3L) and your family and flexi-working hours

column2: Job Title:   Sr. Product Owner   Description: We are seeking a highly-skilled Product owner to help customize and implement product solutions for our clients. In this role, you will work with the Product Team to identify clients specific project requirements. You will be responsible for detailed requirement gathering, designing and validating user journeys and coordinating with clients and the Development Team to plan and implement the solution. You should be able to develop a detailed and sound knowledge of the product and be able to communicate this effectively internally and to clients. Company overview:  The automotive market is undergoing a huge transformation and Tomorrows Journeys customisable and flexible mobility software enables companies to innovate in a rapidly changing market. We are working with some of the biggest automotive brands globally to launch market-leading subscription and contactless rental products quickly and in a way that can scale. After enjoying a period of sustained growth we are now looking to add further key hires to our team to match demand for our services. Our vision is to be the SalesForce of the mobility market, powering the best products in the market for years to come. We have offices in London, Milton Keynes, Manchester, and Goa, India. Activities/Duties: Creating user journeys and process maps for different personas & product layers. Manage implementation for new features or clients within allocated budget and timelines, and manage scope creep. Creating and prioritizing a product backlog that aligns with the product roadmap and client commitments. Acting as the primary point of contact for all stakeholders (clients and internal management team) Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams (e.g. developers, designers and quality assurance) to ensure that the product meets customer needs. Ensuring that the product backlog items are clearly defined, well understood, and properly estimated by the development team. Ensuring that the product is compliant with all relevant regulations and standards, and managing any legal or ethical considerations related to the product. Educating clients on how to use purchased software systems and customized system features. Creating a specialized document for each client, detailing all client requirements, customizations made, sign-offs and approvals taken. Ensuring that the team is aware of key deliverables and project milestones. Collecting feedback from end users and stakeholders to continually enhance the product. Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user-friendliness to complex design roadblocks.     Skills/Qualifications Proven experience in managing complex digital products Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development. Experience with setting and tracking success KPIs Experience with transformation projects, to modernize legacy systems and processes and create efficiency through TJ products. Experience with Google Analytics / Tag Manager or other web performance tools Experience with using data driven insights to enhance customer journey and increase conversions Experience in development of SaaS products. Exceptional communication skills to understand the needs and requirements of clients and internal teams. Sound understanding of agile product development processes. Experience in creating & documenting user journeys and process flows. Sound analytical skills to critically evaluate product issues and updates to come up with solutions. Project management skills to ensure goals are met in a timely manner. Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively. Excellent organizational and time management skills.     Department: Product Location: Mandrem, Goa, India Hours: Mon-Fri (10am-6pm IST) Holiday: PL: 25 days + UK Bank Holidays (8 days)

column2: The Service PLM is responsible for leading and developing the service portfolio for low voltage (LV) and medium voltage (MV) products as well as for other products such as transformers. The focus is on repairs, scheduled maintenance, and start-up services (installation and commissioning).              Key Responsibilities:        - Develop and manage the lifecycle of service offerings for LV and MV products, as well as transformers and other technical products.      - Plan and monitor on-site and off-site services, including repairs, regular maintenance, and start-up services.      - Ensure compliance with quality standards and customer expectations in service execution.      - Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to promote the service offerings and expand the customer base.      - Analyze market trends and customer feedback for continuous improvement of the service portfolio.      - Develop training programs for service personnel to ensure proficiency in the latest technologies and service practices.      - Manage customer relationships to build long-term partnerships and ensure high customer satisfaction.      - Monitor the financial performance of the service portfolio and create budgets and forecasts.                  Qualifications:       - University degree in engineering, preferably in electrical engineering or automation technology.      - Experience in service management or product lifecycle management, ideally in the electrification or automation industry.              Confidential              - Strong technical knowledge in LV and MV products as well as other electrical components like transformers.      - Proven skills in project management and customer relationship management.      - Excellent communication and team leadership skills.      - Proficient in English and ideally in another foreign language.              Working Style:       - Team-oriented with the ability to manage complex tasks independently.      - Problem-solving oriented, with a strong focus on customer satisfaction and quality improvement.      - Flexible regarding travel and work location to visit customer sites and provide support

Key Responsibilities:                 Core Compensation Management:                       Plan, design, configure, and test solutions in Workday for Core Compensation management, ensuring alignment with organizational compensation strategies and policies.                             Serve as a subject matter expert for business stakeholders, addressing questions and troubleshooting issues related to Core Compensation      elements such as compensation packages, compensation plans, compensation basis, compensation elements, grades, grade profiles, salary ranges, benchmark information, compensation eligibility rules, and external payroll earnings     .                             Provide production support for Workday Core Compensation, including analysis and troubleshooting of design, configurations, business processes, integrations, and data.                           Advanced Compensation Solutions:                       Collaborate with HR Technology leadership and business end-users to implement and optimize Advanced Compensation functionalities within Workday, such as Compensation      Review     , Merit, Bonus,      Stocks, and Statements     .                             Conduct comprehensive analysis to identify opportunities for enhancing compensation programs and processes through the utilization of Advanced Compensation features.                             Coordinate testing to ensure that Advanced Compensation solutions align with business requirements and are seamlessly integrated into existing HR systems and processes.                                   Cross-Functional Collaboration:                       Participate in Workday s periodic product release planning and testing, staying informed about new feature-sets and understanding their impact on Core and Advanced Compensation functionalities.                             Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including HR Business COEs, Digital/IT, and External Vendor organizations, to ensure that Compensation solutions effectively support broader HR and business objectives.                             Work closely with stakeholders to translate business needs into requirements, conduct gap analysis, and recommend appropriate solutions and business process workflows.                           Documentation and Communication:                       Create and maintain comprehensive product documentation, including updates for user guides, job aids, and training materials.                             Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels of the organization, providing insights and recommendations regarding Compensation management strategies, processes, and technology solutions.                               Qualifications:                       5+ years of experience in HR technology, with at least 3 years of hands-on experience specifically in configuring and managing Core Compensation and Advanced Compensation modules within the Workday platform     (experience on manage by basis total is a big plus)     .                             Strong knowledge of HR processes and practices, particularly in the areas of compensation management and total rewards.                             Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with stakeholders at all levels of the organization.                             Proven ability to work independently across different time zones in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple priorities and deadlines effectively.                             Familiarity with Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Agile product delivery frameworks, as well as tools such as JIRA, to facilitate efficient project management and collaboration.                             This position offers an exciting opportunity to lead the optimization of Core Compensation and Advanced Compensation functionalities within Workday, driving impactful solutions that enhance the employee experience and support Carriers strategic objectives. column2: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Technical Product Marketing Manager to join our team     This role involves a unique blend of technical depth in EDA tools, creativity, and marketing prowess to drive product positioning, messaging, for our product portfolio     The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the EDA industry, market trends, and customer needs, coupled with the ability to articulate complex technical details in a compelling and accessible manner     As a member of the Product Marketing Team in the System and Verification Group, you will partner closely with development teams, application engineers and account teams to help define and drive the go to market strategy for our AI-Driven Verification Full Flow     This involves understanding customer verification challenges, and recognizing trends in the market place as our customers develop cutting edge ICs across a variety of end markets     You will have an opportunity to acquire both breadth and depth of technical and business knowledge, get wide exposure to the top semiconductor companies, and have the ability to influence both the solutions we develop and the how the value proposition is communicated both internally and externally     This role also provides a front-row opportunity to participate in the evolution of AI-Driven solutions addressing the most pressing verification problems     This an excellent opportunity to work in a supportive and friendly work environment, where we are vested in each other s success, and are passionate about technology and innovation                   Experience and Technical Skills required            7 to 11 years of experience in product marketing, technical marketing, or related roles within the Semicon/EDA industry in IC verification or similar technical domain.     Customer facing experience in a highly technical role (application engineering, product engineering, technical marketing)     Strong technical background in EDA tools, methodologies, and the semiconductor design process. column2: As a Senior Product Support Engineer, youll partner with our product and engineering teams to resolve bugs, prioritize customer requests, and document APIs and functionalities across multiple applications. We are looking for exceptional support engineers who have the demonstrable ability to debug complex calling and meetings issues, and have the drive to learn and grow technically, solve challenging problems, and exceed customer expectations.         What you ll do         Triage, prioritize, and resolve or escalate tickets reported by Customer Support and other product development teams like product, engineering, and QA.     Become the primary investigator of complex calling and meetings related bugs.     Own a specific production problem and/or customer request and provide active coordination between various internal teams in resolving them.     Support engineering teams to deploy new features, hot fixes, upgrades/patches in production and staging environments and work closely with QA and customer support teams to schedule and test.     Develop extensive documentation for both customers and internal teams to reduce troubleshooting time and drive faster issue resolution.     Research, analyze, and diagnose complicated technical issues through leveraging backend systems and logging.     Lead active incident management and post-incident learnings.     Generate detailed dashboards and reports for facilitating the product and engineering roadmaps to identify the classes of incoming tickets and improve the product quality & stability.     Become a subject matter expertise in one or more of the following areas: various products, technical stacks, deployment environments and tools.     Partner with engineering teams to develop robust monitoring and alert detection systems that aid in expediting issue identification.     Monitor application performance and make recommendations to improve overall application proficiency.     Collaborate with engineering and product teams for developing internal tools, enhancing bug management workflows and automating processes to create efficiency.     Start leading and/or mentoring other production support engineers on a fast growing team.         Who you are       You consistently thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth, rapidly changing environment with the ability to work with and deeply understand a new product or service. You ve prior experience working in shifts to provide 24X7 production support across multiple applications. You are a good communicator who likes helping people. You re an expert in developing & improving internal support tools and processes that aid in providing a better developer experience, proactively identifying potential issues, and resolving customer issues faster.         Skills you ll bring         8+ years experience in supporting large scale distributed systems, SaaS-based solutions working with global distributed teams across multiple time zones, in the Voice and Video over IP and/or business communications (UCaaS/CCaaS) industry.     A technical background with excellent English written communication skills and empathy for software engineers and customers is vital.     Attention to detail and a strong passion for quality - experience maintaining high quality customer facing software applications.     Excellent problem solver who loves to learn and is interested in VOIP telephony, Video Meetings and working with people.     You are curious and persistent. Some issues take hours or days to pin down. Also you will be self-directed and able to prioritize work so that everything that s urgent gets done.     Experience with, and/or an interest in learning, a broad array of frontend, backend languages & frameworks and cloud computing technologies.     Strong experience with Windows, MacOS platforms, and VDI environments.     Deep understanding of networks and networking issues.     Deep understanding of SIP and WebRTC.     Ability to read logs from the apps and understand:       SIP and WebRTC handshakes.     WebRTC stats, like MOS scores and audio energy.       Understanding of HTTP and SIP error codes.     Ability to connect the dots between logs from different parts of the backend. column2: As a Product Manager at AppOmni, you ll be working on a product that helps secure customers and their data - a challenging problem in an exciting part of the security industry that does not yet have many defined solutions. This position is an opportunity to take ownership of a key product line within the AppOmni platform. Leveraging your SaaS application experience, market, and customer research, you will develop an effective product roadmap to deliver a product that customers love. You will be responsible for managing and growing the AppOmni platform which fundamentally helps customers address key SaaS security management concerns. You will communicate the product roadmap to customers, collaborate with sales and customer success to capture customer feedback, and partner with engineering to drive the execution of product requirements.         What You ll Do:         Identify and translate complex customer challenges into an exciting and innovative product roadmap.     Write technical product requirements documents and discuss technical trade-offs with engineering.     Drive product development in line with established success criteria based on the technical needs of our customers; work with design on delivering solutions that are intuitive and delightful.     Collaborate with Sales, Engineering, Design, Marketing, and Customer Success to successfully execute the product strategy.     Manage the entire product lifecycle from ideation to launch and be accountable for success criteria and OKRs.         What We re Looking For:         A strong technical background with a keen understanding of how software development teams work.     Enjoy solving difficult technical challenges and delivering the outcome to customers to make their lives better.     Deep domain knowledge of security disciplines, SaaS B2B applications, and marketplaces integration is essential.     A proven track record of building and scaling a successful product and at least 5 years of product management experience.     The mindset that the best products are built through collaboration. You are a strong advocate for the brand and for the customer. You relentlessly focus on taking an outside-in approach to product management.     Excitement and eagerness to share the stories about your product with the rest of the team and across the security industry.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled Product Manager or Senior Product Manager to focus on Clinical Software Applications.          The Product Manager or Senior Product Manager of Clinical Software Applications will have extensive experience managing the successful development of end-user software products from concept to launch, with a strong focus on user interface. Ideal candidates will also have experience working within the data security and privacy standards for healthcare software, as demonstrated through experience managing software for electronic health records. This is a high-visibility position within Nference and will offer opportunities for professional growth and development. Successful candidates will work closely with external partners to deploy the software solutions in health systems.               This cross-functional position requires close collaboration with Senior leadership, commercial teams, software engineers, and clinicians to develop and launch market-ready software solutions that integrate with electronic health records to streamline patient care. The Product Manager or Senior Product Manager will report to the Sr. Director of Product for Clinical Applications.          To be successful in this role, you must be a self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, agile environment - this will require wearing many hats, the ability to change direction quickly, and an eagerness to learn new technologies as needed.               This position will be on-site in the Bangalore office of nference. Occasional travels as needed - within and outside India.               Responsibilities:                 Establish and adhere to project timelines and deadlines, track and report progress towards go-to-market goals, and prioritize workflows to produce best-in-class solutions.     Collaborate with internal stakeholders, such as research, marketing, commercial, and sales teams, to accurately address end-user needs.     Articulate and align internal stakeholders to execute a vision, and build product roadmaps and feature requirements for healthcare software that supports clinical decision-making.     Leverage end-to-end software product management experience to successfully deploy newly developed software solutions that smoothly interface with electronic medical record systems.     Work collaboratively with stakeholders - engineers, commercial teams, UI/UX designers, and clinicians - to develop, test, troubleshoot, and document these requirements.     Prioritize product features and capabilities with input and direction from the commercial team based on customer needs, market conditions, and competitive analyses.               Required Qualifications:                 1-4+ years of experience in user interface/end-user software product management or a similar field; 5 years of relevant experience for Senior Product Manager     Experience within healthcare software (ideally cloud-delivered SaaS), interfacing with medical records, and knowledge of regulatory requirements (HIPAA, HITRUST, etc.).     Experience articulating your vision across the organization and inspiring others to execute.     Experience setting, driving, and achieving product timelines from concept to launch, including building product roadmaps and feature requirements for healthcare software that supports clinical decision-making.      Capable of building product requirements in collaboration with engineering, scientific, and clinical teams, and seeing through execution, including roadmap, sprints, test, validate, and release (including feature briefs, presentations, technical and feature documentation, release notes, user manuals, etc.)     Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with solid attention to detail.     Impeccable communication (oral, written, and presentation) skills; passion for creativity     Experience working in a matrixed team structure (engineering, scientific, clinical, commercial), influencing across product areas/groups, and developing/delivering product roadmaps.                     Preferred Experience         Preferred experience with Clinical Applications systems, SaMD (Software as a Medical Device), FDA regulatory processes, QMS design control, etc.     Healthcare software (engineering or product) background, including regulatory and compliance requirements     Experience addressing and adhering to information security standards regulations and requirements, such as HIPAA, covered entities, and EHR integration, in end-user software solutions
